company_name: Radisson Blu Hotel & Convention Centre Kigali
title: comfortable stay
review: nothing all was perfect Everything was outstanding

title: We shall not re-book
review: One bedroom was without hot water, though this was not explained prior to booking.There was no table at which to eat.We were assured the premises would be cleaned on a daily basis - this happened only on the last day.There was no wifi (though we accept this was mentioned in the property description).We did not think the property gave value for money. The beds were OK

title: The internet was extremely bad!
review: The internet was extremely bad!!! None

title: I had a wonderful time.
review: The service road towards main road, if tarmacked then it would be awesome. The location of the property is what stands out, nice, serene environment.

title: Good neat and clean apartment.
review:
Nothing to dislike.
 Good neat and clean apartment.
Nice place to stay.

title: Potential needs developing
review: You have to buy the electricity, gas, toilet paper,  etc. You only get the basics. It was a good price and the staff were very helpful.

title: Extremely welcoming!
review: None Staff extremely friendly and willing to help with anything, good kitchen facilities, great breakfast, secure facilities. Very detailed welcoming instructions and recommendations in Kigali. Would highly recommend.

title: Good place in a nice neighborhood
review: There was some work going on in the hotel as they are expanding and it was sometimes a bit noisy in the morning but I was positively surprised by how quiet they were while working. Breakfast was good and different each day (we had pancakes once, then eggs with a tomate sauce).The hotel is charming and calm, it is located in a good neighborhood close to restaurants. Each day they provide water in the room which was nice.

title: Taxi from the airport made me feel comfortable first and...
review: Bottled water in room or available to purchase would be a good option. People are still leery of "filtered water". Taxi from the airport made me feel comfortable first and foremost, and I continued to feel safe and at ease during my stay at The Nest. Breakfast was wonderful, help with things to do and locations, having hot showers, a clean room, a pleasant atmosphere and a well kept facility were most appreciated.

title: Great location with many restaurants around.
review: There is renovations/construction ongoing so It was noisy early in the morning. I was staying in a room that gives to the backyard so I assume if you request a room at the front it wouldn’t be as bad. Great location with many restaurants around. Staff was pleasant

title: Nice location, felt very safe even when it was dark.
review: None Nice location, felt very safe even when it was dark. Great restaurants around - tried NowNowRolex beside Kigali art cafe and it was so cosy. The breakfast was fine with delicious smoothie also. Would come again.

title: It was super clean and comfortable and in a great little...
review: None It was super clean and comfortable and in a great little neighborhood with tons of food to walk to. The recommendations they provided for restaurants close by were great. Breakfast was solid and they staff was nice.

title: The property is a great location.
review: None The property is a great location. However, the bedrooms have no tv and no one came to clean our room throughout the time I spent there. Also, the breakfast is so bad.

title: Nice little place that feels like a higher end hostel in a good location
review: Could hear a lot of noise from other people walking around, opening and closing their doors etc. Unfortunately didn’t sleep well because of that. Breakfast was really good

title: Friendly people, great taxi service for pick-up and...
review: Noisy neighborhood. Work in process in the house as well people returning late home from a nearby bar. Water pump noise, every time someone used the water tap. Friendly people, great taxi service for pick-up and available for city tour.Nearby restaurants accessible by foot.

title: Enjoyable stay
review: There is no mosquito net in the room. During our stay we had several water cuts. The water cuts were from outside so the property couldn't do much about it. Nevertheless, good to keep this in mind when booking. I liked the breakfast, but for people who like a bit more variety this stay might not be the way to go. Breakfast is the same daily: yogurt, muesli and fruit. Great location, close to many restaurants and bars. Quiet enough though in the evenings. Friendly and helpful staff.

title: The shower was amazing;
review: The mosquito net didn’t close. The shower was amazing; hot water and strong pressure. The staff was helpful with any questions I had. It was walking distance to several places, which made me feel safe at night as a solo female traveler.

title: Very nicely located in a quiet neighborhood in Kimihurura.
review: Our room was pretty basic (although we booked the „deluxe“ option); especially the bathroom could use some renovation. Very nicely located in a quiet neighborhood in Kimihurura. Many very good restaurants within a short walking distance. Staff was very friendly and helped us with any questions we had before and during our stay. Breakfast was simple, but very good with great coffee, fresh fruit, muesli and yoghurt - which is particularly nice since we had eggs every single day in our other accommodations in East Africa.

title: Peaceful stay in a busy city
review: The listing said that the room came with a bath, which it didn't. The facilities were good, the kitchen was well equipped enough to cook in. Staff very friendly and welcoming. We really enjoyed sitting on the balcony and watching the eagles in the trees opposite.The area is full of good restaurants and has some supermarkets. It is a bit "expatty" though.

title: Good Value, Location (very quiet and safe).  Clean Facilities.  Nice Staff
review: WiFi was sketchy.  It would disconnect periodically which makes it frustrating to book airline tickets etc.Checkout process with credit card is a problem.  They manually enter your card details into a laptop.  Slow and they mischarged me the first time creating a hassle to sort out.  They should upgrade to a modern card reader! Clean, quiet and new building.  Nice shower with  hot water.  Nice staff.  Free laundry service!  There are 2 nice restaurant/bars within 5 min walk.  Mambo (with pool and volleyball court and space for kids) and Sundowner with good BBQ and pizza.

title: Lovely abode
review: Nothing I like the fact that they were on time to pick us up from the airport, the breakfast was okay as well as the fact that they were extremely clean.

title: The staff was lovely and the breakfast was great.
review: It was a bit loud at The Nest with patrons coming in and out in the evening and the road was surprisingly loud. The staff was lovely and the breakfast was great.

title: Perfect stay
review: We had the room with window to the patio and there was a quite loud water pump even at night. Breakfast was really nice but little We really liked the neighborhood, the comfy room, helpful and friendly staff.  Thanks a lot!

title: Great location and owners
review: Nothing The owners are lovely. We ended up landing a day late from original arrival and Vincent was able to rearrange our taxi from airport. He was flexible and appreciate his support. They make you a lovely breakfast.

title: Great location, within walking distance of some restaurants,...
review: It was very quiet, but didn’t bother us as we were a couple, but if you’re a solo traveller it might be lonely. The kitchen had very few things to cook with, so was a bit of a struggle, but we managed it. Breakfast was usually late, despite them asking us the night before for a time. It was difficult to find the staff if you needed something. Our bathroom had a weird smell.  Great location, within walking distance of some restaurants, bars and supermarkets. The room was nice, with a mosquito net. Common area was okay. Staff were friendly and helpful. Laundry service was good. Breakfast was good, really nice to have something different from eggs!!

title: Lovely place with very helpful staff.
review: None Lovely place with very helpful staff. The area is awsome, very green, very safe and there are planty of great restaurants around. Would gladly repeat.

title: The brakefast was magical.
review:
The walls are thin, and if you are a loud speaker you might wake up the neighbours. The brakefast was magical.
The location is very central.
The staffs are very friendly and ready to help 24hours.

title: Aside from the simple rooms, this B&B is really a pick...
review: The rooms are quite simple, one day the hot water was not working Aside from the simple rooms, this B&B is really a pick and excellent value for money! Rosine was amazing. she was friendly,helpful and attentive. She even washed all our clothes for free! The breakfast of musli wirh fruits and joghurt is simple and delicious (quite a change from all the fried eggs you get elsewherr). The neighbourhood is fantastic with lots of good restaurants in walking distance

title: Average but good experience
review: If they clean the rooms everyday..mine not cleaned  for 3 days n no new towels unless requested! Single room..very small n you could hardly  move or breath  fresh air!! Sorry to say I liked it security n cleanness. Good location.

title: Very Welcoming host Vincent how gives support in whatever...
review: I happened to have one of the rooms located on the back of the house near the water pumps which sometimes during evening and nighttime made some noise.  Very Welcoming host Vincent how gives support in whatever needed. And the location is awesome with many restaurants around the corner and a very safe environment.

title: Lovely guesthouse with character
review: The pillows were on the uncomfortable side and the mosquito net didn’t close properly. Lovely place to stay in a nice and convenient pocket of Kigali - lots of restaurants and nice shops near by, and the guesthouse includes a handy guide to local haunts. Vincent and other staff were great - very welcoming and helpful. Nice breakfast included as well. The place has character and is a great choice in Kigali.

title: The Nest was lovely
review:
None I enjoyed my time at The Nest, very comfortable, super clean & well located. There are several restaurants within walking distance in this quiet & beautiful neighborhood.
The stuff were extra helpful with Vincent & Claire catering to my every need. Highly recommend.

title: The Nest is a Great Place to Stay
review:
The bed was always creaking. The Manager promised to fix it. The staff were wonderful - always ready to help.
The location is great, and close to lots of restaurants and bars. The place is very clean and organized, and the breakfast is very healthy.
Guests get their own set of keys so they can go out and come in at their convenience.

title: Affordable stay in Kigali
review: The room we had didn't look much like the pictures we saw online. It was a bit shabbier and dark. We stayed here during the last 2 days of our two week trip of travel in Kigali and Uganda and it was by far the worst of the 5 hotels we had been at. However, it is very affordable and the kitchen space offers an alternative for those who would like to cook. Also, the shower was not great. The first night it was ok but during the second day the water pressure was poor and the water would alternate cold and hot while showering. The location was great and the staff were friendly. It was also a great price.

title: Nice Guest House in Kigali
review: Price is very reasonable thus they clean the rooms once in three days. Breakfast ok for me but for others maybe too simple Like staying in a home, good bed, friendly staff, excellent location near restaurants, good price.

title: Fabulous Small Affordable Hotel in a Wonderful are of Kigali!
review: Bed wasn’t the most comfortable but we slept fine and for the value this hotel was excellent! Excellent neighborhood with fun bars/delicious food in walking distance! Vincent is wonderful, warm and helpful! He waited for us when our bags got lost and helped us figure things out when we arrived at 1am!! Amazing!! He actually came with the driver to pick us up which was so kind! We loved having the porch and the location and price cannot be beat!!! Thank you!!! We hope to be back!!

title: greatly comfortable stay in a quiet area, close to nice cafes resturants and bar
review: None Great location in a quiet neighborhood, walking distance to great cafes, bars and restaurants (Incl gym). Spacious room with essential facilities. Good vibe

title: Vincent is a great administrator.
review: Vincent is a great administrator. Free laundry was a beautiful surprise. Walking distance from many restaurants and cafés. Short moto ride to town. The bedroom was clean, comfortable, hot water.  None

title: Good Place to Stay Near Airport
review: One room is very small, and was quite tight for two people. Then we moved to the room with the balcony, which had much more space, and was nicer. Good location, relatively close to the airport, and close to several good restaurants. Excellent wifi. Staff was very helpful.

title: The Nest is in a lovely safe neighbourhood.
review: On the morning of checkout Vincent had to be away but someone was organised to prepare breakfast and check me out. She never showed up which was difficult as you have to lock the gate so that was my only complaint.  The Nest is in a lovely safe neighbourhood. Vincent was very helpful he organised a taxi for me who was great and I used him for the whole stay. I had the small room which was adequate and quiet. Lovely breakfast of muesli yoghurt and fresh fruit.  I was on my own and felt very safe.

title: received confirmation of booking for 2 nights, arrived 30...
review: None received confirmation of booking for 2 nights, arrived 30 min later to be told there had been another booking and I would only be able to stay one night

title: Nice place/ nice neighbourhood
review: No nice breakfast options, no good recommendations to breakfast places in the area. Luckily we found kigali art cafe ourselves next to snackbar “now now rolex” were they offer a delicious breakfast! Large rooms, good place to store luggage.

title: Fantastic. I will stay here again.
review:
None Spotlessly clean room and common areas, fantastic hot shower with good pressure, very big room and nice comfy bed, great large mosquito nets, super fast internet,  great quiet area close to local restaurants and amenities, very nice and helpful host.
I will stay here again when back in Kigali.

title: Vincent was a fantastic host!
review: None Vincent was a fantastic host! He was so welcoming and helpful and answered every question we had. He made us feel really relaxed staying at the nest. The wifi was AMAZING, easily the best wifi I've experienced in hotels in East Africa. The neighbourhood is also really nice and it feels so safe. The nest is also in walking distance of many great restaurants. It was great value for money.

title: Staff / management is flexible and accommodating - they...
review: None Staff / management is flexible and accommodating - they provided great local recommendations as well. It was my first time in Kigali, the accommodated an early check-in, coordinated airport transport, and made local recommendations (even have connections to local tour guide). Rooms and kitchen aren't luxurious, but they are nice, clean, safe and home-like.  Also, the Nest is in an amazing neighborhood with great restaurants and is close to the city center (which made exchanging currency and grocery shopping on arrival very easy). Extra perks include free laundry service (takes a few days, but much appreciated) and filtered water on tap. Be sure to book a room with a balcony view - it's worth the extra few $!

title: Wonderful would definitely go back and recommend The Nest and Rwanda
review: Nothing Vincent our host was excellent.  The location was perfect.  Vincent arranged our tour with a perfect guide.Vincent also provide great recommendations for local restaurants within 5 minutes walking from The Nest

title: Great location in a beautiful little neighbourhood in a...
review: None Great location in a beautiful little neighbourhood in a fenced enclosure. Felt very safe. Walking distance to some nice cafes, restaurants. Big, spacious rooms with balcony (private double)

title: Modern, comfortable accomodation.
review: They ran out of water, which thankfully a staff member offered us a gerry can of water and a bucket. However it was an inconvenience especially when their marketing materials boasted they rarely/never ran out of water as they always had extra water in their tanks just in case. The room was clean and comfortable. The bathroom was modern and had proper fixtures. The location was also optimal.

title: Great location, clean and comfortable room, great Internet...
review: If living in Kigali for more than one month, there are other cheaper guest houses/ private housings to live in. Great location, clean and comfortable room, great Internet connection and stable hot water!

title: The caretaker was very professional and helpful.
review:
The breakfast was good but no variety. 
The location was nice but not convenient.
The mosquito nets did not fit the bed properly
There is no airconditioning...it can be hot.
They don't clean up your room everyday The caretaker was very professional and helpful.

title: The Nest and its surrounding area have a very nice feel to...
review: None The Nest and its surrounding area have a very nice feel to it. Vincent was fantastic and organised our airport pickup. He even came to the airport to pick us with the Taxi. The breakfast was very good and healthy. There are also plenty of nice restaurants nearby.

title: Excellent location very close to good restaurants.  A nice city centre bolthole.  We will return.
review: The exploding extension cable, and the offered replacement featuring a bare wire was not good.  But a third one was fine.  There was a slightly stale smell from somewhere in the bathroom, but everything worked fine.  Unfortunately, our room was very near the water tank ... and noisy pump! It's a casual place, which was quite nice.  The staff are all very helpful and friendly.  The room was clean, and the bed was comfortable.  The location is excellent with several restaurants within easy walking distance.

title: Definitely recommend this place
review: None The manager Vincent is super kind and helpful. He makes great yoghurt breakfasts with fresh fruit and granola. It is safe with a gate and a locked front door. There's always filtered water available for drinking and hot water in the shower. The location is amazing.

title: Excellent location and premises, lovely host, would highly recommend
review: The double room was a little small and we would have liked a balcony (we can dream, right!) Most importantly, it was extremely hot and desperately needs a fan to enable sleep. Friendly and welcoming hosts, felt very at home, lovely house and superb location.

title: Good value, great neighborhood
review: Disappointed that the "shared" spaces (living/dining room, kitchen) were not more available to guests. I had planned to cook, but in the evenings the owners were always cooking, so the stove was not available.  Pots were left overnight on the stove and dishes in the sink, so even cooking breakfast was not possible. I suppose that I could have voiced this more, but just got the feeling that it was not really meant to be a "shared" space, or perhaps that previous guests had just not used the space so they didn't realize that they were inconveniencing others who wanted to also use it.Payment upon checking out was difficult, they aren't set up to take cards. I assumed that the payment had been made through booking.com, but it was not and I did not have enough cash on me. Had to request an email address to make the payment through paypal, but this whole process took an extra 10 minutes while my taxi was waiting. The value for money is very good, the neighborhood (Kimi) is excellent. There are many restaurants, cafes and a great gym just a block away. The room is big, bed is comfortable, internet is strong. Would recommend for the value alone, especially given the neighborhood. Hope to see this guesthouse develop more in the future.

title: Having seen a few other places in different price ranges, The Nest provides the best value.
review: There are a lot of keys (gate, front door, room), but only one set per room. The bottled water in the kitchen is actually filtered water, not bottled water. But even with my sensitive stomach, I was fine, so the filter is good. The location was very good. The streets are safe to walk, even at night and there are plenty of good restaurants close by. I especially liked The Epicurean. We had the large room with a small balcony, which I would highly recommend. It was very pleasant to sit there at night. Vincent, the manager, is a great guy. I would stay here again.

title: I loved this place and wished I had tried it sooner than the...
review: It might be nice if breakfast was included, but not a deal breaker. The sign is a little misleading and it’s actually the gate next door so I walked into the wrong house. Besides those minor things it was all perfect.  I loved this place and wished I had tried it sooner than the other guest houses I tried which were pretty terrible for basically the same price. You MUST try here. I have been here 7 weeks and this is the best value for your money. It’s super clean, the staff is nice and speak English well, the building is beautiful and has nice modern features and pretty decor. For a guesthouse this is your best choice by far. The breakfast is nice and coffee is good. The water works well and is nice and hot. And the WIFI actually works and is good! This is one of my favorite places I have stayed here in Kigali. I would come back and am glad I chose this for our last few days. It is walking distance to Kigali heights or a short moto ride.

title: Best value for money, centrally located, clean, safe and quiet!!
review: None One of the most beautiful experiences of my life! The Nest is situated in a lovely part of Kigali with lots of restaurants and clubs within walking distance. Vincent is such a wonderful person. I will always make The Nest my home away from home whenever I'm in Kigali!

title: good, clean, reasonably priced...pleasant overnight stay, thank you Vincent!
review: the house is not sound proofed.You hear keys opening doors, footsteps, etc... the very hot shower with great water pressure,the friendly welcome,the location

title: The Nest will be by home away from home in Kigali
review: I liked everything! The Nest is a beautiful, clean and quiet guesthouse in one of the most beautiful and elegant areas of Kigali. They offer high speed internet, and Vincent the manager is one of the most amazing people whom I've had the pleasure of meeting.I would recommend The Nest to visitors of all ages! 5 star accommodation!

title: A great place in a fantastic location.
review: I would  have liked a plug in mosquito repellent; I think we've had one the last time we stayed. The  Nest is relaxed and homely. There is a common sitting area inside and out and a kitchen for guests to use. The location is superb; safe to walk around with lots of restaurants and cafes nearby.

title: A little more attention to details could make this a go to for many visitors to Kigali
review: The beds could have been a bit more comfortable and the bathrooms have a proper shower curtain. Also the smell of mold bothered me a bit. There was no variety in the breakfast. You could request something but poor Vincent couldn’t make eggs. He did buy what was requested by the guests tho. I liked how accommodating Vincent was from the moment I booked. I also liked how centrally located it was. Vincent is the best thing about the Nest! He rocks!

title: Incredible value for money!
review: There's really nothing not to like... it's just a really nice home away from home. This was an incredibly clean, modern, nice room and bathroom in an ideal location.  The value for money is just insanely good.  I doubt I would stay anywhere other than here in Kigali when I return.  It's essentially a "base" in the city where you're free to come and go, you feel more at home than in a hotel.  Such a helpful and pro-active place.  The staff even did our copious amounts of laundry for free (!!!) Vincent was very friendly and made us feel welcome!

title: Very comfortable. . . .
review: None The accommodation is simple, in terms of amenities, but the decor is beautiful, looks like new, and is very clean. The art on the walls is by a local artist and if you really like something, they have contact info for the artist so you can purchase something if you're interested. I didn't have breakfast there (although it is an option). There's a shared kitchen, so you can make your own food if you want, and there's also a number of good restaurants within easy walking distance as well. They have an information sheet in the rooms with relevant information. Staff are friendly and professional. They also have high quality internet, and reliable hot water and electricity.

title: View
review: Staff are v good  but i request them to refind my money because they charge the room twice instead of once pls concider. View

title: Great value, great wifi
review: None Breakfast was good, location was good. Facilities are clean, simple, and comfortable (just how I like it). The wifi is excellent.

title: Friendly staff and the price.
review: The noise level. Friendly staff and the price.

title: Nice place and friendly staff.
review: None Nice place and friendly staff. Definitely a good value for money if you stay in Kigali only for a few nights.

title: Lovely hostel in very popular location, right next to...
review: None Lovely hostel in very popular location, right next to excellent restaurants and cafes. The staff was super warm and welcoming.

title: Highly recommend for anyone on a budget and who is not looking for a fancy residence.
review: None Staff are very friendly and responsive to guest's needs. Breakfast and laundry offerings are a very nice and helpful touch.

title: Nice big room in a very leafy and very safe part of town.
review: None Nice big room in a very leafy and very safe part of town.  The staff was excellent.  Nice breakfast also.

title: All 5 stars
review: All 5 stars Staff were excellent

title: Friendly staff
review: A pipe had burst in one of the bedrooms so no water for three days  Friendly staff

title: Good breakfast and great location.
review: The bed was quite uncomfortable and old. Good breakfast and great location.

title: The dead mosquitoes on the wall.
review: The dead mosquitoes on the wall. None

title: Best hotel in Kigali for that price
review: None Best hotel in Kigali for that price

title: Satisfactory
review: None Very nice and accommodating staffs.

title: Make The Nest your base in Kigali.
review: None Just a lovely friendly place to stay. Accommodation in Kigali like it should be at a price that is very good value. I'll be back. Lots!

title: A great stay.
review: Needs floor mats for the slippery floors. Needs a designated smoking section away from the front door. Quiet and comfortable

title: The location is perfect
review: There were at least 5 holes in my mosquito net. Also I wouldn't exactly call it a boutique guestroom.  The location is perfect

title: Cute cozy guest house
review: One of the rooms (the one we were in) is very small but the others looked bigger Lovely cozy place in a great location

title: Very nice staff.
review: I would add mosquito nets to the rooms although I haven't seen many mosquitoes as there was at least the raid/essence in the electricity and seemed to be working. Very nice staff.

title: Nice stay near the airport.
review: No division between the shower and the rest of the bathroom. Pillows to soft. Friendly staff and good breakfast. Location near the airport was great. Spacious room.

title: It is a nice place.
review:
None 
They are so friendly and the place is fine. 
I love the whole team both day and night team.
From The gate man, Receptionists, chefs etc.
I hope to stay there in the near future.

title: Perfect location to access the airport
review: The price charged for the property taxi is too high considering it is just 2 minutes drive from the guest house to the airport.Poor wifi connection in the rooms although it worked really well at the lobby. Friendly staff, exceptional breakfast, good location. Less than 10 minutes walk to the airport. ALice was willing to move me to a better room even though I had not booked it.

title: The place should either be a quiet guest house or a venue for noisy events, can't be both!
review: The main problem was that we happened to stay on the same day as a wedding was taking place - even after the main event, there was a lot of noise which made sleep impossible until the early hours.  Our room was basically in the corridor, so people constantly moving up and down, chairs being stacked outside, people using the toilet next door!  If we'd known about this in advance, there's no way we could have stayed there!! The staff were generally helpful and did their best to make us comfortable

title: Well worth it!
review: Breakfast - should at least have option of what type of breakfast/egg to have. Staff are very helpful & friendly! Helped me book my onward travel by bus to Uganda even before arriving at the hotel!!

title: Friendly, comfortable and clean guesthouse right by the airport
review: For longer stays, it might be useful to know that there are bars of soap provided rather than shampoo, etc. (so bring your own if needed) and the shower is a wet room. Really friendly, simple but comfortable guesthouse right by the airport. Even though my flight was early, they still prepared an omelette, bread and fruit for my breakfast and walked me down to the airport, helping me with my luggage (the airport is only a five-min walk away). Would recommend!

title: Friendly Guest House walking distance to the airport
review: The floor was stained which could have been cleanedThe bathroom has no running water anywhere! Couldn't freshen up body upon arriving ( how unfortunate especially when you drive 3hrs from Goma to  Kigali) neither my face or teeth in the morning. I picked this place for the accessibility, it's like 10min walk to the airport. I've also consider price, I paid 30$. The idea was to get an affordable place to sleep a couple of  hours while waiting to take off. The staff was friendly, one of them walk me to the airport, I thought that was kind.

title: I enjoyed it. Felt really relaxed after a long journey.
review: Nothing really. I was satisfied. The 6 bed room dormitory was comfortable. There was a mosquito net and the breakfast was okay. The pick up and drop off service was also good and safe. Chips were good and they gave me bonus salad.

title: Super friendly staff in affordable guesthouse at walking distance from the airport
review: Nothing Very conveniently located at walking distance from the airport. Staff came to the airport to collect us. We had our bicycles with us and we could leave the boxes in the guesthouse while we were cycling around Rwanda, so we use them again for the return flight. We came back one day earlier and happily stayed our last two days at Keva Guest House in Kigali. The staff is super friendly and helpful with everything.

title: Keva guest house is home away from home !
review: None Keva guest house is a very calm and beautiful place to stay while in Rwanda. The property is located at a very good proximity to the Kigali International Airport. I was their guest from 1st to 8th of October, 2018 and I enjoyed every bit of my stay there. The staff are quite friendly. In fact right from when I was booking to when I arrived Kigali, they were of tremendous help. They picked me up at no cost from the Airport when our late flight arrived Kigali, and throughout my stay in Keva guest house they served my breakfasts as at when due. I have no reservation whatsoever to recommend Keva guest house to anyone or group travelling to Rwanda....... Eke Jude U. From Nigeria.

title: Very clean hotel with helpful and polite staff !
review: Doesn't have good isolation , so if the talking in the lobby area or restaurant area are quiet noisy ! Very clean hotel with helpful and polite staff !The rooms don't smelling and no mosquitos around !A lovely restaurant in the hotel with handmade food , really suggest to everybody to have a try !Just few meters walk from the airport !Nice wifi but not all the time !Value for money for dormitory room .

title: A clean hotel near to the airport .
review: Doesn't have good isolation , so if the talking in the lobby area or restaurant area are quiet noisy !Overpriced for single room ! Very clean hotel with helpful and polite staff !The rooms don't smelling and no mosquitos around !A lovely restaurant in the hotel with handmade food , really suggest to everybody to have a try !Just few meters walk from the airport !Nice wifi but not all the time !

title: Great stay at Keva Guest House.
review: None Great stay at Keva Guest House.  The guest house is located very close to the airport, the staff at Keva kindly picked us up after a late flight.  They were very welcoming and offered good advice for our onward journeys.  Highly recommend staying here!

title: However, its location is perfect for getting to the airport.
review: It is a bit far from the city center. However, its location is perfect for getting to the airport. (Only a 15 minute walk away.) The staff was very friendly and the water hot.

title: Pick-up was arranged from the airport, even though I arrived...
review: The bathroom was dirty and the toilet flush wasn't working. My room had open ventilation but no mosquito net, so I had trouble sleeping because of mosquitos and also got bitten during the night. Pick-up was arranged from the airport, even though I arrived late at night. The staff was super friendly and helpful!! Breakfast was nice and served in their sunny and calm courtyard.

title: Location is ok and staff were friendly
review: Not great value for money, no hot water and fairy uncomfortable bed. Also was a mix up with the room when we arrived  Location is ok and staff were friendly

title: Not super far from the city.
review:
Very much noise from people surfing at the bar area during night and morning since the rooms are next to it.
Place has potential for a very nice place with a good atmosphere, but it seems a bit shabby now. Not really worth the high price for a hostel Not super far from the city. Staff was friendly

title: A memorable experience. I plan to go back soon.
review: None The facilities were great and the cost for the three nights I spent there was real value for money. The property is not far from the city. I used to walk to town and back every day. Also, the staff were very helpful.

title: Relatively cheap, good location, friendly staff, nice bar.
review: Small and stuffy room, insect on the floor when I arrived, the shared bathrooms were not clean in the evening anymore, toilet as well. Relatively cheap, good location, friendly staff, nice bar.

title: nice communal area with goos value food.
review: ordered a taxi at reception to arrive in a few hours to take me to the airport. it arrived half an hour late without notice that it would be late. nice communal area with goos value food.

title: Great hostel
review: A couple of the showers are in need of repair, but there were enough available that this was never a major problem. Incredibly helpful staff, good location near a load of restaurants, comfortable beds. Large porch/common area great for relaxing in.

title: Delighted to discover that the hostel is run by the same...
review: None Delighted to discover that the hostel is run by the same organization that created the Genocide Memorial museum, and that all profits go to the foundation. More power to your elbow!

title: The hostel that connects people
review: The toilets are not hygienic and the showers are not clean, there's little water when showering, with only one shower that has hot water The cleanliness of the bedroom

title: It is located in a great area and most drivers know the name...
review: The bathrooms were always pretty dirty. My room was towards the back where people outside talked and played music late into the night. It is located in a great area and most drivers know the name of it, making it easy to return to. You can also get a drink for a good price at the outdoor bar. The wifi worked pretty well.

title: Keva guesthouse is clean and so close to the airport-we...
review: None Keva guesthouse is clean and so close to the airport-we walked there in the morning in under five minutes ! Rose, the proprietor couldn't have been more helpful and advised us on where to eat, helped us with transport (thank you!) and arranged for us to have a super early breakfast at 6am. The rooms are basic, small and functional, off a central courtyard, clean, small bathroom, good value for money.

title: Great, fantastic and convenient.
review: ....just keep up your standards. Value for money. Fantastic place, people and service. Affordable price and easily accessible especially when your flight lands at night of early morning.

title: The room and the place is clean and comfortable, without...
review: We arrived at the hotel at 1pm and there was outloud music at 8h in the morning, that, of course disturbed us a bite. For the regular prices in the country and because it s not in the city center, I believe the price could be arranged. The room and the place is clean and comfortable, without luxury. Less than 10min by foot from the airport. 24h check-in. Breackfast included is very nice (fruit, bread with confiture and they cooked us omelette). Big bed. They offered us towels costless. Staff is nice, helpful and speaks english. Was pleasant and at the same time a bite confusing not having a mosquito nest, they have electric antimosquitoes devices. If you wait a while in the shower there is hot water.

title: Location near airport was excellent, only 5 minutes walk.
review: None Location near airport was excellent, only 5 minutes walk. We were collected from the airport, which was really nice. Place was clean, people were really nice. They even helped us with renting a car.

title: I enjoyed my stay though was short. The staffs were friendly and accommodating. Good job!
review: They should ensure all other rooms no matter the cost should have a television set I enjoyed the warm reception gotten even before I got to the hotel. Immediately after my booking online was wowed they opened communication with me immediately via email and telephone.

title: Overall a good trip.
review: - Nothing nearby in terms of restaurants etc - Quite expensive (10 USD each way) to get to the centre of town - Next to the airport - Nice room - Staff were good

title: Easy and good stay
review: On the website of booking is stated breakfast included, while at the property we had to pay for one person (other was free they said..) The personal touch and service by collecting us from the airport in the evening.

title: Good time with good food and good internet
review: The credit card machine didn't work so I had to go get cash before I could pay. The other guests were often loud and dirty. I tried both the dorm rooms and a private room and both were comfortable and met my needs. The staff was wonderful and incredibly friendly and helpful. I had a good time hanging out in the common area, watching the news, sports, or music videos on tv, using the internet, and meeting new people. The food available for lunch and dinner is great and reasonably priced (especially given the huge portions). I was annoyed that my fellow guests weren't always clean or quiet, but the staff did an excellent job dealing with that and I was consistently impressed by how clean my room was. The private room was very comfortable and I had my own cupboard to store all of my things. The location was excellent! Near town, the expat neighborhoods where all the best restaurants are, and near to a major road without being loud or traffic-y.

title: Its nice and cozy place.
review: None Its nice and cozy place. Staff is friendly and helpful. Definitely would love to stay again

title: Nice hostel, great location and kind staff
review: The beds are old and there were holes in the musquito nets, only cold water and no working sink. Great location, good breakfast and very kind staff

title: Perfect
review: None Nice staff, nice atmosphere, nice bar.

title: Great internet connection after a long hiatus!
review: None Great internet connection after a long hiatus!  Breakfast was also good.

title: Good location & excellent service
review: A little bit noisy sometimes  The service, staff & atmosphere

title: Bed was quite comfy.
review: Breakfast hours and bar hours were strange. I wish both had stayed open later. Bed was quite comfy.

title: Excellent
review: Nothing Everything

title: Really friendly staff!
review: None Really friendly staff! Please remember it's a hostel not a hotel. And during your stay here you'll support the genocide memorial.

title: The guest house is located extremely close to the airport...
review: None The guest house is located extremely close to the airport and the staff took the time to contact me beforehand to know my arrival time and flight information. They are extremely kind and caring, they offered me costumed breakfast and guess what? I had a chance to witness and Rwandese wedding the next morning and they invited me to have a look. I couldn't hope for better !

title: convenient and cheap
review: very noisy at night as there is no sound insulation in the rooms.   The noise from the staff didn't stop until 1am and started again at five am.  also I ordered food there (a cheese omelette and some fruit) for dinner, they have a long menu and I guessed they would cook everything from scratch, hence I ordered something simple.  it still took them 90 minutes to make my omelette. very close to airport - walked there in five minutes.  very clean and friendly, wifi ok

title: Great location and great hosts
review: None This site is in a great location albeit on an unmade road.  The rooms  were really clean and safe, and an easy walk to the airport - 300m.   It is unbelievable value and the hosts were willing to do anything to help us (even wait up till 1am check in!). Communication also fantastic. Definitely go there again.

title: Amazingly Perfect for a Small Budget.
review: The distance to other places around kigali, which isnt a big problem though.But the plus is that the guest house is about 4 minutes walk from the airport. I LOVED EVERYTHING. For the value for money, its a place i would always love to stay. Staff were very nice and helpful, rooms were very clean and breakfast was good too.

title: It's a great value for money, specially if just want a...
review: There was no soap or towel, but as soon as l told the receptionist he brought it immediately! It's a great value for money, specially if just want a decent place to crush before o after your flight. I paid $10, l was alone in a dorm and had breakfast included. Dont expect luxury, but come on it's only $10!! The receptionist is very sweet and helpful.

title: Excellent
review: Perhaps some warm water to bath in! The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. They helped me get transport to the taxi park and also directed the Boda driver in the evening to come back from the Taxi Park. On the morning I left they helped me walk to the airport.

title: Lovely guest house, run by passionate peoples
review: Water flow in the sink was poor, hard to brush teeth! This is a cheap guest house but not to be overlooked. It’s run by some great people who are committed to their guests comfort. Our dinner was cooked from scratch (pizza!), our room was fresh and clean and despite the airport location it was exceptionally quiet until 10am!

title: Nice cheap hostel in good neighborhood
review: Bathroooms not always that clean during the weekends  Friendly hostel with a big porch in a nice neighborhood

title: Very nice place to stay in Kigali
review: None staff was helpful ande very kind

title: Good value. Pleasant location.
review: Animal in my room, eating my food. No wash basin in the toilet. Bed comfy and clean. Great coffee shops and restaurants within 25 minute walk.

title: best in rwanda
review: nothing everything

title: Discover Rwanda Youth hostel
review: The wifi signals in my the room was poor The staff and ambience of the lounge

title: Owesome place.
review: Property has no hot shower facilities. Food is owesome....cook Jumpo was too good.Staffs are very good, accommodative and helpful.Specially location of this hotel is great if you wanna stay near to the airport in a very cheap rates.

title: Budget place but there are better options in Kigali. Use if you want to be near airport.
review: Shower water was ice cold and didn't work most of the time, bed not equipped with mosquito net and the room had many mosquitoes and cockroaches. They gave us a repellent but that didn't help much. Booked for 2 people but breakfast was only for one. On booking.com it said kids sleep for free and get extra bed but at the reception was asked to pay more. After some haggling they said it's ok we don't have to add money. Nothing special, it's ok if one doesn't expect too much. Typical african standards. Good that it's close to the airport. Staff doesn't speak English well but is helpful.

title: I enjoyed my time at this guest house.
review: The en suite bathroom had a bad smell. The road that the guest house is on is untarred and quite rough. The guest house is basic but comfortable. The staff are fabulous! The location near the airport was convenient.

title: great value for money
review: Bathroom smell needed air-refresher. Shower space is limited. Friendly personnel, they do everything to make your stay nice. Great value for money. Good choice for low budget travellers.

title: when i stepped outside the airport, a guide was waiting for...
review: nothing really when i stepped outside the airport, a guide was waiting for me.they are a very warm & hospitable hotel.the owner even dropped me in his car back to the airport, without any additional charge.  A 5-star from my side

title: Very comfortable
review: None Very clean and comfortable, very nice and helpful people :)Could arrange my stay fast and easy, I recommend it

title: Nice large room with bathroom and everything needed.
review: Smoking is only allowed out the front of the property. A little far from the room but no problem. Nice large room with bathroom and everything needed.

title: Very good value for money.
review: None Very good value for money. Clean, good customer service, ideal location for the airport. Would recommend to stay here.

title: Very close to the airport, clean and the staff were very...
review: . Very close to the airport, clean and the staff were very friendly

title: Great Lodging, friendly staff
review: None Great friendly staff, Would stay there again

title: Very close to the airport.
review: None Very close to the airport. Staff were very friendly and spoke engliy

title: Fair
review: Stuffy room, small from displayed and no hot bathing water the location is excellent

title: Overall it was nice
review: The Light through da curtains.  The room wasn't very dark. The proprietor not friendly at all. The food is quite expensive. None

title: Nice
review:
Noise from the compound and kitchen -Good staff/The receptionist. 
-5mins walk to the airport.
-Clean compound and rooms.

title: Best place to stay
review:
None Customer care 
Cleanliness 
Food was delicious

title: Every thing about the hotel was Okay
review: Every thing about the hotel was Okay  None

title: Perfect for long layover
review: None Close to airport, clean and comfortable, friendly staff

title: I really did not enjoy the sharing room its not worth it
review: The dormitory eish  its not worth it The dormitory is not ideal for a solo travellers

title: Personnelles
review: They don't have  transport service , to pick up is a problème and drop off , the same thing. I think  there is Management problème.  Personnelles

title: Very nice place to stay. Staff n owner are very friendly n helpful.they go extra in there service
review: None Its near the airport n staff are more than helpful

title: Very close to the airport - great to stay between 2 flights,...
review: None Very close to the airport - great to stay between 2 flights, friendly staff

title: I'll go back to Salama Village anytime!
review: None Great level of hospitality - from the owners to the members of staff. It felt like 'home from home'!The spacious room, with its own patio. It's also quiet, making it suitable as a work-space.Not to mention the beautiful garden.

title: Close to the airport.
review: None Close to the airport. Staff very helpful and accomodating

title: Value for money once you get in to the hotel but the ambience is not alluring
review: Poor location No hot water Hospitality

title: Staff is very helpful and willing to support
review: None Staff is very helpful and willing to support

title: Cleanliness
review: Good stay Cleanliness

title: Had a great stay. The place was very clean and the staff friendly and helpful. They went above and b
review: None Breakfast came with a delicious fruit plate with fresh local fruits.

title: Superb
review: None Ok

title: Very close to the airport, they even picked us up.
review: None Very close to the airport, they even picked us up. Very friendly staff and good Rwandan food for dinner. The breakfast was great too.

title: Clean and spacious accommodation located in a safe environment and near great
review: None The staff was wonderful - always ready to help. Jean Paul was amazing. He was friendly, helpful and attentive. He even washed all my clothes for free.Lovely place with all facilities like a very efficient internet and nice working space within the room. The common areas are nice and comfortable. The area is awesome, very green, very safe. Restaurants and bars are close by near Kigali Height

title: Nice green guest house, pleasant and safe
review: None The staff was excellent, really helpful and the cleaning team was efficient. The area is excellent, green and safe. A nice coffee shop the "Library restaurant chocolat" is closeby.In short it's good value for money.

title: Quiet Area of City and Very Comfortable
review: None The cottage setup is quite nice.  The staff spoke with limited English but were as helpful as they could be.  Everyone was very cordial.  Very quiet area of town but easily accessible to the city center.  I really enjoyed the common area.  Was nice for sitting and reading.

title: It's in a very quite street.
review: You need to get a moto or taxi or have your own car if you stay here. Apart from the library there isn't much that you can reach by foot. I suppose this place is more of an airBnB, apart from the guard only one other staff member was there. During the evening and night only the guard was present, so it wasn't possible to get water for instance etc. It's in a very quite street. The room was very functional, wifi worked well, and breakfast was served in the room right next door. Breakfast, like in most places in Rwanda, is quite simple: bread, eggs, and fruit; but it was sufficient for me.

title: an enjoyable few days in a relaxing, chilled environment))
review: I enjoyed my stay there)) set in it's own grounds with beautiful gardens surrounding you in a quiet area of Kigali.The rooms are large and comfortable, the service provided was good, the people that work there Cynthia and Jean-Paul are extremely helpful they have a laid back attitude to life which rubs off onto you))

title: Staff were friendly, even if their English was broken at...
review:
Miscommunication between the taxi the hotel arranged for us and our tour operator meant there was confusion and us having to pay the driver, and no clear communication to us. Never saw or was greeted by either Tony or Anjelique. No reception area, no clear briefing or orientation (eg. Is there WiFi? Where is the nearest shop since we arrived starving and there is no food at the "hotel". When are breakfast times...etc). These are all necessary at check-in time. We had to ask about everything.
Because there's no signage whatsoever the B&B (not a hotel, let's face it) was extremely difficult for drivers to find.
In our room, lights in our bathroom did not work, and some power outlets didn't work either meaning that fan had to be placed on one side of the bed (I was completely dry when I woke up, my wife was hot the whole night) Staff were friendly, even if their English was broken at best, making communication difficult.
The location was great, and the street directly outside was green and beautiful. For food nearby, there's Shokola restaurant / bar 15 min walk away up the hill and to the left, and they accept credit card.

title: Beautiful tranquility
review: It was not so easy to find the place as the street numbers are not sequential.  The place is private, comfortable and peaceful. It was an unexpected day off from my hectic life. Staff were super friendly and helpful, including obtaining and negotiating for a taxi for me.

review: the Tv failed to work None

title: Disappointing
review: Unfortunately, Cynthia, the house keeper was unreliable and spoke little English. We were there 4 nights and one morning we had to go to find her to ask for breakfast and another morning she didn't come at all so we got no breakfast that day even though it was meant to be included. Even something as simple as phoning for a taxi was hard to communicate to her and I got very frustrated at times. We ran out of toilet roll twice and ended up buying our own. Good sized room with lovely hot shower. The owner arranged an airport transfer for us on arrival. The house is a good hour to walk to the centre but motorbike taxis are cheap. Pascal, the security guy was so sweet and couldn't do enough for us

title: Good choice for people who are looking for an individual accomodation instead of big luxury hotels
review: None Tony, Cinthia and Jean-Paul gave us a very warm welcome and were always available for questions and offering help. Tony was an extraordnary host, who accompanied us for trips in the city, told us a lot about Kigali and Rwanda, and became a friend very quickly. The breakfast was very nice, with fresh fruits, omelet, coffee, tea, toast, marmelade... Salama village is like living in a big apartment with shared kitchen and living room, individual bedrooms (4 living rooms per building) and individual bathrooms in each bedroom. The beds are big and comfortable, nice rooms, beautiful terrasse to sit outside, a small garden, a living room with couch, TV and dining table, the Wifi was mostly working (with some exceptions). It's more personal than living in one of the classical big hotels of Kigali and I really recommand it, would absolutely return. Arrival, payment, contact via mail and phone, etc. were easily handled without complication, and very flexible. The location of Salama Village is central, close to the American Ambassy and not far from restaurants, even if in itself the neighborhood is really calm, it's not too far from more lively neighborhoods.

title: just brilliant!
review: nothing i loved everything,the garden, the great hospitality and wonderful team. beautiful rooms, beautiful garden... everything was clean. the staff were helpful and freindly.

title: not recommend to be ever use again
review: 1.shuttle was listed on booking .com but in reality i have to get a taxi and pay extra- lost time and money at airport2. no English speaking staff available 3. no water available in room and dirty smelly accommodations absolutely nothing

title: Comfortable and quiet guesthouse
review: We liked everything but a kettle in the kitchen would be useful. Comfortable room in a quiet area. The helpful owner stored our bike boxes whilst we were touring Rwanda.

title: Salama Village is a perfect place for guests who need their own rooms and a common place to work.
review: Additional towels would have been nice as we were there for 10 days. Seraphine and Jean Paul were so key to making our stay comfortable.  We were there to work and often were gone early in the morning and came back late at night.  They both made sure that we were well fed and taken care of - breakfast each morning and a clean place to come home to.

The cleanliness is not up to the standard .... The owner Alpachino....is very friendly...he tries to accommodate all the need of the guest....

title: Feel like you're with your family.
review: None The staff were extraordinary. They were kind, ready to assist and always prompt. The guest house in neat and the food is always on point.  The owner, Mr Andrew is always available to make you comfortable and address your concerns immediately. He was very nice.

title: Great Staff-A Bit Secluded
review: Since the guesthouse was located on a dirt road, it was difficult to walk around and a taxi was required to get to most locations. And to be fair, it wasn't hard to get a taxi and most locations were fairly close. The manager, Andrew, was very helpful and even took time on his days off to drive me to a few different locations. The staff were very attentive and eager to please. The breakfasts consisting of fruit, coffee or tea and eggs, toast and potatoes were perpared whenever required. The room was large and clean, and the garden area was very nice.

title: Very attentive service and tasty dinners
review: None Corina K Guest House offered excellent value for money. Young staff members were very cheerful and helpful, room well designed but the main hit was the restaurant's specialty - if you are not vegetarian, definitely order it!

title: Adequate for a night before flying out
review: Rooms with a balcony don’t actually have a balcony, loud crowd at the bar/restaurant right outside my window late into the night, no air conditioning Inexpensive, quick response to booking, food was very slow but good

title: Fabulous accommodation, great service delivery. Expectations met and highly appreciated.
review: There was nothing I didn't like. The service was customized according to our needs. The owner, Mr. Andrew Kayitano is just such a good person who knows what he is doing and also has the interests of the guests at heart. He went out of his way to support me and my colleagues in a number of ways during our stay and bu just that alone I would 101% recommend the property to any traveler without any second thoughts. This is likely a place that I would be checking myself into next time I am in Kigali, Rwanda without a doubt.

title: The staff were without exception friendly and helpful.
review:
We really liked that the chefs always cooked with the freshest ingredients however this meant meals had to be ordered at over an hour in advance so the ingredients could be bought from the market. The staff were without exception friendly and helpful. The chefs showed a lot of creativity and flexibility in dealing with a wide range of dietary needs in our large party of nine. The food is honest, tasty, nutritious and comes in generous portions. 
Andrew went beyond the call of duty to ensure that our stay for meetings and a conference was productive and enjoyable. This included a trip around Kigali for members of our party who never been there before, transport to and from the conference venue and arranging the use of data projector and an extra WiFi router.
The close proximity of Corina K to town and the airport by car was also an advantage and there is a decent selection of shops for the essentials within walking distance.

title: The staff at Corina K is amazing!
review: The location for the facility is not so nice, though very safe. And the place is not accessible to KIC by foot! The staff at Corina K is amazing! Andrew "Slaved" to make us all comfortable! We were a group of international delegates who had come for a conference and the hospital was just something out of this world!

title: Despite being in a different venue, it helped me to expand my circle of friends.
review: The electrical extensions could be built in. I wish also ironing boards are provided.  I would have strongly appreciated a TV in the room. Staff was friendly and ready to resolve or solve issues.  It gave me a chance to walk to the city, a 5 km walk.

title: The manager Andrew went out of his way to ensure I was...
review: Maybe tune the channels on TV in the room to something other than news. This was done on my last night so at least I got to watch something else..of course you could choose to stream something if you prefer... The manager Andrew went out of his way to ensure I was comfortable- arranged airport pick up for me and took me where I needed to go when necessary.  And the staff - Joseph and and Clenie were extremely helpful, friendly, professional and kind. The breakfast was delicious and filling too. Rooms were very clean and good and reliable WiFi.

title: Extremely hospitable owner and staff
review: The lights in the room are very dim which makes it gloomy. He provided us with a lamp which was very sweet but it will be great if a higher powered bulb is installed and small lamps can be placed in the rooms so that whoever wants less light can switch on lamps and otherwise the rooms are well lit. We loved the hospitality of the owner. Andrew really stretches the limits to make the stay comfortable for you. His hospitality was amazing. Also the staff is always there to help you. They even got extra stuff from market for us when we requested. If you are looking for a reasonably priced option with readily available hot water, fresh juices for breakfast, nice coffee and readily available and supportive staff this is the place to stay. I think we have made good friends with Andrew and will definitely be seeking his support in settling in Kigali :)

title: Owner was friendly and  tried hard to accommodate our needs,...
review: Location was not 0.4km from the Kigali Convention Centre as indicated on Booking.com. The location is unexpectedly in an unplanned neighbourhood .TV wasn't connected and therefore didn't work. There was TV in the restaurant/bar and the  main reception.Shower didn't have enough water pressure, and the enclosure had no door. Owner was friendly and  tried hard to accommodate our needs, including offering to drop us off at the convention centre each morning[in reality 3.2km away] at no extra charge.. Friendly staff. It was in a secure compound and safe.

title: Insightful and fun
review: A bit off road to the venue, but nothing you cant handle. The Host gives insight on how best to enjoy Kigali and provides information to make the visit most memorable. Staff very friendly and helpful- Customer was truly king. Enjoyed the tour of Kigali by the Host

title: Enchanting stay at a lovely house with a very kind and dedicated staff
review: Pressure of the shower. I loved the dedication of the staff! They were super helpful and nice - they sorted out various things (small errands, taxi-motos booking, etc.). The view on the city is nice as well!

title: I valued the kindness and hospitality particularly the individualised service and tour of Kigali
review: The wifi capacity needs to be improved since it could not work most of the time even when it was on. Individualised service; Staff is very hospitable, responsive and went the extra mile to exceed my requests; Tea flavoured with ginger; Breakfast and Dinner is Quality and Value for money; Airport pickup and Local transport at affordable rates and at my convenience; Tour of Kigali

title: Amazing Hospitality!
review: None Amazing Hospitality! Their Staff was tremendous and professional.Barely a stone throw away from the KCC, if you're attending any functions at the KCC

title: Corina Guest House is certainly a place I want to go back to the next time Im in Kigali
review: It rained on one of the nights I was there and the little road to the guest house was muddy and a little difficult to navigate. Nothing to dampen a good spirit though It was very close to various forms of transport, particularly the airport. The facility is also clean and since its atop one of the many hills in Kigali, provides an excellent view of parts of the city

review: The rooms are not clean. The bed is not good at all. Internet is weak. It is really not a good place to stay with your wife. The external view of the property and the space to park the cars.

title: I had a wonderful and memorable stay at the Corina K guest house!
review: None I absolutely enjoyed my trip! The accomodation was excellent. The staff very warm and welcoming. The food which was prepared fresh on demand was very tasty. My host Andrew was very respectful, jovial and welcoming. I felt very much at home. It is like being with your own family back home. He took me round town to view the lovely city Kigali and to see memorable places. I will not hesitate to recommend this guest house to any prospective guest! God bless you all Corina K guest house host and staff! Keep it up. The sky is the limit!

title: Serene, calm, friendly and cheap but area not attractive because of the ongoing construction work
review: Road to the Facility is under construction. The staff did well in terms of hospitality. In fact most of the things I know now about Rwanda, I got to know it from them, They made me feel like I am still with my family.  The value for money is excellent. Whenever i visit Rwanda again, I

title: An excellent place to definitely stay each time I visit Kigali
review: Everything for was perfect and am sure it will continue to be the best. The place is excellent, food very nutritious and some vegetables produced and picked from the back garden. The bed was extremely comfortable and shower clean and nice.The staffs were helpful, friendly and very polite like any place in Bern Switzerland where I stay.The hotel manager a Swiss trained guy here in an institution close to Lausanne is very good, used the acquired knowledge and really transferred it also very well to his staffs!

Good in case you are on work travel and want to come back only to sleep. The hotel is basic and efficient. The rooms are quite compact and the breakfast at the hotel is decent, though not very exciting. The location is nice and was close to the venues I wanted to visit. The breakfast starts at 6 AM which was great considering my work meetings started at 8.

title: Comfortable stay in Kigali
review: Wifi only worked on the ground floor.   Friendly staff.decent basic breakfast. Clean rooms. Shower was nice and hot and had good water pressure.

title: A very nice hotel for Kigali and more intimate than the bigger hotels.
review: Rates are a little high, but quality is good. They are trying to do a very nice restaurant with better service than most. Kigali is known for the slow service, but this is better and worth the wait. Servers very nice and polite.  Eating  outside very is very pleasant.American owners are very friendly and running a very good boutique hotel

title: Should have been a perfect 10, but... 😐
review: What would have been a perfect stay was spoilt on the last night when we were kept awake by blaring music and loud conversation from what seemed to be a party next door. I complained to the front desk who came back to inform me that the noise was coming from outside the property and they had "no power to do anything about it." A night during which I hardly slept was followed by a 6am call to inform me that my 7:45 airport transfer wouldn't work because of Umuganda on the day. Which is perfectly understood, but surely this should have occurred to the person at the desk when I made the request the night before? And that's how we left the hotel... tired for lack of sleep the night before, and in a mad rush to get to the airport. No breakfast obviously. All this with my three year old daughter in tow... I was looking for a place that wouldn't feel too "attending a conference" as some established global chains tend to.  Met my expectations in this regard. Staff were generally great and made my daughter feel extra special. The owner Josh was also pleasant and engaging and had great ideas for child-friendly activities which were important for us. Nice ambiance and lived up to the eco-friendly expectations I had. Good restaurant too.

title: Beautiful and very Heart warming. A home away from home.
review: The fact that I spent just 3nights, should have been more lol The entire ambience was serene and made extremely homely by the warm staff.

title: Was pleasant stay I enjoyed
review: The mosquitos in the bathroom, they need to close the opening in the window The room style , the restaurant was super nice

title: It is a little paradise on Earth and I had an unforgettable stay fo once in Kigali
review: None The cleanliness, the wide beautiful rooms and bathrooms, good pillows and beds, the stylish and convivial decoration, the appetizing food and the friendly bar, the warmth and kindness mixed with professionalism of the manager

title: The facility was good but the food was not so good
review: The receptionist Abdul if that was his name assisted us to book a tour. We asked for a taxi with someone who speaks good English and a reasonably good car. He gave us someone who does not speak English at all and the car had no seat belt at all at the back and we were going 170kms away. When we asked to change cars and driver before we left he refused. This impacted the quality of our tour. I liked the location. The facility is very clean

title: Overall we are happy with our stay. Nobleza is a good hotel in a great location. I
review: We have been to Nobleza before for lunch. This was the first time we stayed overnight. There are some things that need upgrading in the room especially carpets, paint, bathroom tiles. Buffet breakfast, swimming pool, relaxed atmosphere.

title: Good
review: Staff tried to charge me more than I should have paid until o had to take a picture of their own information from information book in the bedroom. Cleanness

review: Rained heavily on the day I checked in..Was a nightmare for me to get to the reception with all my luggage... I loved the environment and the staff are so friendly like Philemon..Very clean and nice rooms..Will definitely visit soon..

review: 1. WI-FI was unreliable2. Was unable to swim as it was always cold late afternoon/evening when I could afford to swim. 1. Helpful staff2. Clean facility

title: Great for the family and we enjoyed our three days.
review: The breakfasts were very poor in that the choices were somewhat limited. Friendly staff who were very helpful. Pool very clean. Nice grounds and very good play area for young children.

title: Home away from home in Kigali
review: Did not accept cash payment using pre-2009 series US dollar notes. Had to change these to local currency at a Forex bureau Very clean room and friendly staff. Exquisitely prepared meals at the restaurant. Electric mosquito repellents installed all over the facility, in rooms, corridors and all

review: Cold breakfast at 8.30am with limited options, no AC in the room and poor WiFi in the room (level 1). The room is spacious. Bathroom was very neat.
