title: Overall better
review: Food it is fully local The climate and the location of the hotel, though it is far from airport but nice place to escape from daily noise

title: great stay but I could have paid less for same value.
review: furniture was outdated which I don't mind for a cheaper price. breakfast choices were very limited especially hot dishes location was safe for you to walk around at night, Breakfast seatings on the pool were super. The spa was good. room service and housekeeping very responsive.

title: Would chose Serena everytime!
review: Nothing. Excellent check in great staff. They remembered me from my previous stay. Rooms very clean. African theme makes hotel feel like home. Wife strong and dependable. Room service quick food tasty and warm. Large bet with clean white crisp sheets. Turn down service is excellent. Gym fantastic! I have stayed in many hotels in Kigali and Serena remains my #1

title: GOOD VALUE FOR MONEY
review: They should install Arabic shower for toilets. The next door Marriott offers good value for money.  Good facilities  , however , due to the clay finish it looks tired over time.

title: A breakfast to make you want to get up in the morning!
review: Pool was completely frigid. Not sure if this is a result of having several cold days in a row? It was beautiful but we couldn't stay in it for longer than ten minutes. The breakfast is great and has a very generous range of options. Staff was attentive and room service was good, even late at night. Nice gym. Very comfortable.

title: One the cleanest countries in Sub-Saharian Africa
review: The internet connection was extremely poor. At the beginning I thought it was simply because the telecommunications network in the country is bad, but then I saw that the connection in a neighbouring hotel where I had a meeting was much better. Good restaurant. Excellent breakfast. One of the evenings I had for dinner the best beef sirloin I remember in the last years

title: Nice place but not cheap
review:
Everything is a little bit slowly, but this is Africa... ;-) The location is good. Close to interesting points. 
The breakfast is excellent, the staff is attentive.

title: Good stay, great food.
review: Nothing Food very good,especially breakfast which was excellent.  Great staff. We had unfortunate experience with faulty plumbing in first room but were quickly and efficiently moved to N upgraded room.

title: Pleasant stay at Serena Kigali
review: My only complaining is that took a bit long to get coffee at the table by the server. At least that’s my concern – I come to the restaurant for breakfast to eat not to chat and wait. That’s why I Always choose a hotel with the buffet breakfast. I prefer that coffee is already made and can be self-serve immediately.And, Rwanda’s coffee anywhere I had it is one of the best coffee in the World.I would also suggest to the chef to have gluten-free bread, dairy-free milk and plant based spread (margarine or some other type alternatives to butter and mayo). Great food and theme dinner parties. Everything was fantastic.

title: Fabulous stay - looking forward to my return.
review: Nothing The bedroom was very spacious; bed was super comfortable. The food selection, presentation and taste were all fabulous.Staff throughout the hotel were excellent

title: Loved my stay. The staffs made me feel at home shout out to Thierry, Andrew, Diana, Arline, Apophia
review: The breakfast spread was basic and could have been more. Also the bathrooms could have a shower curtain or mats because of water. I loved my stay at the hotel. The staff were excellent hosts and the ambiance was perfect. The location was spot on and it was a relaxing stay. Enjoyed the non stop entertainment every night with the live band and also the A la carte menu at the restaurant.

title: We arrived so late in Kigali and it was a relief to find...
review: Everything was perfect!! I highly recommend this place especially for a family. The only thing was that internet was a little slow (as I had to work at night). The owner of the apartment is going to upgrade. We arrived so late in Kigali and it was a relief to find Tenny, the manager of the apartment, who came with a taxi driver to pick us up from the airport. He showed us the apartment. Florence and her husband, the owners of the apartment, were also lovely persons and they facilitated my stay together with Tenny. The apartment is not far from the Kigali convention center which was convenient for me. The apartment has a kitchen, washer and living room (shared). Nice view from the terrace. The price is very reasonable, definitely worth for money

title: Everything was okay
review: Nothing Everything was okay

title: It was a great place for stay.
review: None It was a great place for stay. It’s Clean and quiet also. I would recommend this place to everyone.

title: Friendly and helpful staff, good food, excellent spot to sit...
review: This seems like a Rwandan thing but whenever they washed the car or washed my boots (without asking) they always expected a tip (which is fine if i asked for it). Its nice of them but i had a rental car that i was turning in so i didnt care if it was clean. But thats the only thing so its a minor issue. Friendly and helpful staff, good food, excellent spot to sit and relax while enjoying the views. They have a guest computer in the conference room that was helpful.

title: This hotel has a lovely feel to it - a little more than just...
review: None This hotel has a lovely feel to it - a little more than just a hotel. I loved our room and felt at home there. Not as impersonal as a lot of other big chain hotels.

title: Very Nice enviroment and location.
review: The beds could have Been a bit softer. Very Nice enviroment and location. The staff was great. Clean and lovely hotel. Good breakfast!

title: Very good and would come back anytime I am in Kigali
review: The bed could be harder Happy about a room upgrade and breakfast quality

title: Excellent services
review: Nothing Great

title: They had good breakfast spread.
review: No welcome drink and no fruits in the room. They had good breakfast spread.

title: The people
review: No ATM machine in hotel The people

title: Lovely Serena
review: The Internet was strong enough but it kept disconnecting.  The property is clean, well maintained and had a lovely gym and spa area.

title: Excellent
review: Nothing Superb Customer Service

title: My booking.
review: None My booking.com booking was not appearing at reception and they wouldn’t take my booking intially .

title: My stay here was great. Great service, good people great vibe
review: Very little disappointed me at this hotel. The coffee station not being in the room was a bit of an inconvenience for me. The hotel website looks to one currency EUR & doesn't have a built-in converter to assist. Something that can turn one off whilst doing a search online for hotels. The hotel has a wake-up call service but don't depend on it. I have learned the hard way at another hotel. I decided to put ONOMO KG to the test it to the test & unfortunately failed. Never received that call.Yes, i would stay here again. Everything about this hotel just exceeded my expectation. Home away from home indeed. This hotel was a random choice, a hotel chain that is new to me. Let me start by appreciating the staff of ONOMO Kigali. An exceptional team that strives to cater to your needs. I am talking from the housekeepers, Security guard, the waiters, front desk personnel, Assistant Managers & General Manager. Comfortable rooms equipped with separate shower & ablution facility. Rooms interior design is chic & modern with wall art. Well, the rooms are not large but functional. Wide opening windows, of course with safety limits. Excellent wifi coverage & Speed. Most importantly the rooms are airconditioned. No coffee stations yet in the rooms however coffee is complimentary for staying guest at the lounge on the ground floor. The hotel bost with facilities of an infinity pool overlooking the neighbouring settlements, a gym, small garden, conference rooms, open plan lounge with bar flowing out into the Pool Terrace. Plenty of seating space, be it for a candlelight dinner, a Business Brunch or a quick meeting with friends. Food is great by the way. Not sure if parking is free. The Airport shuttle service was on time upon my check out. Aaaah and not forgetting the surprise birthday the staff setup...lol. It was really special. Find Leo, William or Carine at this hotel if all fails. I am sure they will find a way. To Jorge, Everything rises & falls on leadership. You lead a team that has the future of this hotel at heart. To the readers, search no further you have found the hotel for a memorable stay or dining.

title: Lovely interior, friendly local staff, but service at resto slow, and dinner buffet hit or miss.
review: Check in - manager at check in very loud and aggressive with a customer when I entered to check in, but the local staff were all great. Check out took a long time, and I had a coffee while waiting yet they still did not manage to bring my receipt, I actually had to drive back to the hotel to get it.  There was not information when reserving or checking in that this booking did not include breakfast, and that was a surprise to have to pay extra - in Kigali all the hotels I stay in give breakfast. Lastly, we arrived late to the hotel after picking up my husband from airport in evening. At 9:30pm only buffet was available for dinner, nothing to order on menu. Buffet line up looked like a group of children had run through it, all disheveled, some dishes cold and not heated through, half empty dishes not appealing looking at all - would have been better to just close the resto and tell patrons the resto is closed rather than serve substandard buffer like that. Disappointing. Lovely design inside, and comfortable room.

title: Affordable luxury and great service
review: None The rooms are so clean, the bed was very comfortable and the showers are some of the best I’ve experienced on the continent. Staff were very attentive and went out of their way to meet my needs.

title: Large room with a great view, breakfast was good, nice...
review:
No kettle or coffee maker, kitchen facilities but no dishes or utensils ( are you supposed to bring your own? ).
Only 1 bath towel for 2 people. Very poor service in the restaurant- took 1.5 hrs to get burgers with cold French fries. Most of the employees seemed stressed. Large room with a great view, breakfast was good, nice infinity pool and bar, good location

title: Feel at ease in Kigali
review: No complaints. It was all I desired Great breakfast, nice bed and splendid shower! Very nice lounge/restaurant/bar. And because the hotel is sort of a 'landmark' all motor taxis know the place.

title: Nice view
review:
Wifi would kick on and off constantly my entire stay. Using software on my laptop that would register this to verify my phone having the same issues
You’re right in the city but at times had to wait awhile for a taxi. Perhaps a Kigali thing?
‘Fitness Centre’ isn’t a very appropriate term for what is actually in there as it’s less than basic Nice view
Lovely dining area around pool
Good breakfast 
Good coffee
All staff was great but out front of the building they were confused easily by most basic request

title: Excellent choice world class ambiance and views to die for ...
review: Nothing at all the place rocked. ~The ambiance and pool was amazing , staff really professional and very accommodating . I asked to bve changed for a better view and was done the next day seamlessly .

title: Cool place, value for money
review: None Excellent staff

title: We would stay there again without hesitation.
review: I can't think of anything The breakfast was wonderful, and the service all-around was impeccable.  We felt safe at all times, it was a quiet location with a beautiful overlook of the city.

title: Nice and quiet villa!
review: No wifi in the rooms but this did not real bother. We enjoyed our stay in Step Town Hostel. People were very kind, not only the manager but his entire staff. We arrived early but our rooms were almost ready and we could take a breakfast.The rooms were comfortable and big enough. We slept well.It's pleasant stay on the terrace, with a nice view on the town of Kigali. You are away from the crowds.Like Kigali is safe these days you can easy walk to a restaurant in the neighborhood, for example Mille Collines.I hope they continue to maintain this property!

title: Amazing Rwanda
review: I can’t say nothing bad. Rwanda is the country of thousands hills and smiling people and I absolutely agree. The manager is so kind and lovely person and his staff as well. The location of hotel is also really good. Everything is near. From Kigali I went to Gisenyi. The manager gave me a driver, who has been also absolutely amazing person. If I visit Rwanda in the future I’ll come back to this hotel.

title: Great location, great city. Wish I had more time to explore.
review: No complaints The staff here were amazing. Very helpful and kind. The rooms are a little small and noisy but the staff and location make up for it. The restaurant is also very convenient.

title: Fantastic staff in hotel located in a very quiet area
review: The hotel is a bit isolated situated and really nothing in walking distance. Very nice and helpful staff that went out of their way to accommodate me in the best possible way.

title: Helpful personnel
review: The room was good but a bit old.  We stayed only one night in the Step Town but were happy that have chosen this hotel. We arrived in the late afternoon, when the heavy rain started in Kigali. It was very kind that staff provided an umbrella, otherwise we would've been wet. The hotel is located on a hill, from which you can see a big part of Kigali. It has a terrace and a room to read and chill out. The breakfast provided was very good! We had an omelette with tomatoes, crunchy toasts, fruits and delicious African coffee. The taxi to the airport was organized on request. According to our guide from Musanze, who brought us from the Northern province to Kigali, Step Town is a good budget hotel in the capital and we tend to agree with him.

title: Great place to stay clean and friendly Staff.
review: Step Town Motel was an excellent place to stay very clean,  friendly and helpful staff especially the staff at the reception.. I enjoyed staying there and will definitely come back. I liked their rooms and the checking in time was quicker than most places.

title: Great host
review: Location was a bit hard to find. And hot water doesn’t last very long time for more than two people Manager was very friendly, kind, helpful and doesn’t take too long to get what I have asked for.

title: Friendly staff, good breakfast, moderately clean
review: Rooms were dated/old, lighting was poor, WiFi connection was awful in the room, located on a really bumpy unpaved road, checkout was difficult because credit card machine wasn't working Friendly staff, good breakfast, moderately clean

title: Superb hotel!
review: None Superb hotel!

title: I dont understand
review: gmy and spy I cant complain I like they breakfast and staff is very goods  they need to change toilet is too old mini Bar is empty nothing in

title: all fine
review: beds were too soft all went well

title: Clean & calm
review: Food Clean & calm

title: Comfy bed.
review: None Comfy bed. Friendly staff. Good room rate

title: Our room was amazing!
review: None Our room was amazing!

title: No airport shuttle services
review: No airport shuttle services None

title: Very nice hotel clean and good food
review: None Hotel had good location and good atomsfeer

title: The view, the pool, the rooms, the vibe.
review: The billing and check-out process was a terribly cumbersome experience for all of us. We were incorrectly billed and it was a generally messy process that took 45 minutes. Staff are working with the right attitude and trying hard to maintain customer service but further training is required for them to maintain and continually improve standards. The view, the pool, the rooms, the vibe. Beautiful, new and clean room and facilities. The gym, albeit small, is great but equipment and space can definitely be expanded upon in the future. Great bar and lobby for working meetings. Good security. Friendly staff.

title: Safe, secure, and clean hotel - about what you would expect.
review: Not in a walkable neighbourhood (i.e. nothing nearby that you could get to easily by foot), but that's not really unique for most of Kigali's higher-end hotels I think. Other than that, no complaints about the hotel itself. Safe, secure, and clean hotel - about what you would expect. Rooms spacious and well appointed. Restaurant/bar & pool nice view and ambience overlooking the town, and not too overpriced.

title: Good hotel, affordable price
review: Rooms are quite small, and the bathroom is right next to the bedroom, which we didn't like too much. They also took 1h to serve the food. Diana, at the front desk, was great. The staff in general is really nice and helpful. Breakfast is good.

title: New Kigali landing spot
review: While the location is quite good and central, not much entertainment is at walking distance Super clean and calmQuality showerGood restaurant Nice setting

title: Everywhere was clean and tidy.
review: Ordered dinner and it took forever with no feedback from the waiter. After two hours, we went to the kitchen and was told the food made was not good enough and they have to make another one or something else. We were upset but they compensated us with drinks on the house.You have to go for breakfast before 9:30am else most of it is gone already. Everywhere was clean and tidy. Breakfast was okay. Room view was nice. Very nice to sit by the pool in the evenings. Quiet and really peaceful. Great place for cooling off.

title: The property is good, wish they wud bill to the room, have a room service and a better hotel manager
review: Their pre-authorization for breakfast and other bills. The hotel manager was the worst person I met at the hotel, he is full of himself, instead of being humble to guests and his stuff. I didn't like how he orders staff in public. He also shouted at me, when I carried food to my room instead of talking to me with respect about their policies no room service. The rooms, bedding,  food and services from junior staff was fantastic

title: Wow! Great value hotel and the concierge and waiters...
review: None Wow! Great value hotel and the concierge and waiters (especially Alan) were very welcoming! The hotel is very new and the room was quite savvy for its small size and very comfortable for the little time we spent in it. The food at the restaurant was amazing, the beers icy cold and the views over the vanity pool and city of Kigali at sunset were beautiful! Definitely our preferred hotel in Kigali and would highly recommend to all travellers! Congratulations to the management here, you're running a really great establishment!

title: A new 3-star hotel with nice pool and clean functional rooms, but not well located (for my needs).
review: Poor location (given my needs) - not within an easy walk of any restaurants or shops or my workplace. Slow service in the restaurant. Room lacks an easy chair, and would be too small for a working couple. Nice view over the valley. I enjoyed the pool, which is small but refreshing. Comfortable bed and sheets. Nice shower.

title: Overall a good place to stay
review: We had both some very positive and negative experiences with the staff. While some were efficient, attentive and friendly, other were just super slow to carry out any task. I was travelling with a friend and we booked this hotel twice, specifying we wanted twin beds, so we were frustrated to see they assigned us a double bed room, we had to complain twice and wait around at the lobby for a while. Also, we'd always call the reception and ask for a meter taxi (yogo), and it happened twice that one of the staff called someone he knew so he could charge a much higher fixed rate. I was very pissed and said I would complain about this issue. Breakfast was good, location is good, interior decor is simple, but modern, mattresses were comfy

title: Absolutely incredible hotel
review: None Hotel is placed very well, at the breakfast you can see the beautiful view of Kigali.Wi Fi is good, personnel is very polite and helpful. They helped us with the road, we left here pur bag for several days cause fe got a small trip to the west of Rwanda.And...I might say that it was the cleanest hotel I've ever seen

title: Great property, great location - lovely people
review: Please provide water every day as part of the room - that is really the only challenge we face. Great property, The staff, the location and the property are great

title: Lovely happy stay  .... the staff have become like family :) .... we will be back soon
review: Please provide water every day as part of the room - that is really the only challenge we face. Very friendly and accommodating staff - brilliant, happy smiles .... nothing is too much trouble - specially to Robert, Thomas and Emmanuel and the housekeeping staff

title: My stay was OK.
review: If the building was located somewhere alse. I didn't like the roads The area is not my tasse of coffee so I just move out right now I'm somewhere alse.

title: Otherwise, a good place
review: There was water coming from the shower room to the bedroom on the floor every time one had a shower, that is very dangerous as one can slip and fall resulting in injury. None

title: Best value for money for a one night stay
review: Pillows were rather hard This Hotel offered exactly what we were looking for - a safe , easy place to spend one night . we arrived at 1030 pm and left the next morning at 8 , so didn’t want to spend that much money for one of the more we’ll known hotel chains. The hotel offers an airport pick up for 20 USD and overall is simple but with very friendly staff , good breakfast and a stunning view.

title: Very welcoming and relaxing oasis in the capital.
review: None Great hospitality, wonderful team, clearly everybody, including security guards, cleaning personnel, service people.  The manager, John, is going out of his way to help with anything the guests need or request, as do his colleagues.  Delicious food from the in-house restaurant, thank you also to the kitchen team!Privacy is greatly respected and there is no pressure at all to book any tourist activities.  You do as you like.  Step Town is a very safe place and also walking 15 minutes to the city center or taking a motorcycle taxi is a safe way of getting around.  We loved our stay at Step Town a lot and are looking forward to returning to that welcoming and pleasant place, hopefully in the near future.  Thank you again, dear Step Town Team!

title: Great place!
review: None For the second time to this great accommodation.Manager and staff are very helpful and always friendly.Large rooms, very clean.Nice view.Feels like home.

title: Very large and well appointed room.

the reception lacks a little professionalism when it comes to managing issues of the clientele
 The property is well secured and safe place

review: None Surprisingly green n full of life

title: There is a beautiful garden, room was ok, the breakfast was...
review: The location is quite far from everything. Especially no exchange office or ATM anywhere nearby. Would have been good to know when arriving directly from the airport at night. The personel did not really care about the guests. They were friendly but would not really help to support the guests. It seemed that they were more houskeepers than actual hosts. There is a beautiful garden, room was ok, the breakfast was good.

title: Staff, location, food, environment.
review:
Room are small and no cough to rest. You watch the TV on the bed. Too simple!
Place not good for long stay. Staff, location, food, environment.... very nice.

title: Onomo Kigali was a great place to stay for us. We got a chance to chill out and relax totally.
review: Because of the language barrier (translation of the local language to English) a lot of information was lost in translation e.g they do not allow food in the rooms and they were hesitant about late check out yet this was written in English on the brochures provided in the room The wait staff were great, they went out of their way to ensure that we were comfortable and had a good time at the hotel.

title: Reasonable hotel for the price( Kigali is an expensive place). Avoid lunch/dinner. Good breakfast.
review: The restaurant (except breakfast) is super slow. Our dinner order took about 1h15 minutes. The taste & quality was seriously sub par. My wife ordered a wrap and instead she got given a very hard biscuit-like wheat bread. Good location. Friendly staff.

title: My expectations were exceeded
review: There breakfast was good but there should be a better variety. The meals are are very good and the staff is very friendly and willing to help at all times

title: It is worth to stay at this hotel.
review: A waiter forgot my order at the restaurant. Not big problems, but they should be professional. The room is not big but enough for us. The restaurant is wonderful. Both dinner and breakfast are good. The pool is beautiful but not enough size for swimming.

title: I can bet this is the cleanest hotel  in Kigali .
review: Staff overall are welcoming but I and my friends who was staying in the hotel didn’t like how we were treated at checkout. The agreed late checkout was not met. I think some staff need to be more professional in a way they communicate  with customers.  Brice, Henry, Aime... their  Customercare is beyond exceptional. Abigail needs a little refresh training about  customer interaction 🙁 I can bet this is the cleanest hotel  in Kigali .

title: stay was good and comfortable.
review: i was not a huge fan of the room setup. had this really short wardrobe dividing the bed from the restroom which i found very odd and it made me feel like a kid always going low to fit my stuff in. the staff were a bit slow and were never on their desks as there were times when we called down to reception and did not get responses. they also messed up our early breakfast request. like how white everything was. was really clean and reminded me of a hospital. just sterile!!

title: The breakfast buffet was ok.
review: the dinners took a long time to be served after being ordered.  even simple orders like hummus and pita took about 40 minutes. The breakfast buffet was ok.

title: Great pool, nice little gym, comfortable rooms
review: Internet was a bit wobbly the second day. This was my second stay within a week. My first visit was marred by a very slow check in procedure late at night. This visit was different; front desk was more efficient and staff were attentive and friendly. I really enjoyed the pool deck with a view across the city.

title: Would not go again, too basic
review: Staff is not service-oriented, airport pickup didn't work, no minibar in the rooms, no food after 10pm so you sleep hungry after arriving from a late flight; rooms are pretty tiny Location, rooms are clean, pool has a nice view

title: Good stay for lower budget next to city centre
review: The room was a bit small due to the big wardrobe in the room. Large bed. Clean room. Nice view over some parts of the town. Just next to city centre. Nice and helpful staff. Nice taxi driver who works with the hotel and who drives safely.

title: A great way to step off my quiet live in the Québec forest.
review: It may look a very personnel opinion. All the personnel are always stick to their cell phone  and sometime  you must make noise  or move to get their attention.This observation is also made every where  in the city and around. It seem to be the present way of living even for very poor people. Friendly personnel. John the manager was always ready to help and organize transport and  various accomation.The place is quiet, clean and close from the city center.

title: Excellent place to stay in the city
review: None Very friendly and helpful staff.  Good restaurant, and nice clean room.  Location is good but is on a dusty road and a steep walk up to the 'centre'

title: Happy we found STEP TOWN!
review: The jacuzzi & shower didn't work in our very nice room... too bad as it would have made our stay even more enjoyable! John, the manager was friendly and helpful. We also enjoyed all the delicious meals prepared daily for our team of 13 missionaries.

title: Home away from home!
review: NA Excellent stay!!

title: We stayed in room 440.
review: Bed We stayed in room 440. Two single beds were joined so my wife and l had to sleep on one side of each bed.This is the first time in 33yrs

title: The service was great
review: None The service was great

title: Overall, the experience was good
review: N/A Food, sports facilities and cleanness of the room

title: Room was spacious
review: None Room was spacious

title: a relaxing place to enjoy the weather, and lovely pool with surrounding garden.
review: loud music from the wedding halls friendly staff

title: Nice hotel
review: Spa could do with background music in treatment rooms. Jacuzzi out of order.  Friendly staff,  clean rooms.

title: High quality hotel
review: None High Quality and great service

title: big rooms
review: None big rooms

title: Spacious rooms and very comfortable beds
review: Nothing . It was a very nice hotel to have a weekend break Spacious rooms and very comfortable beds

title: Had a good time in Kigali
review: It was difficult to trace the house since its an AirBnB most taxi drivers dont know so much about it, i got lost on several occasion and my host help wouldn't pick his phone to give directions. I will not recommend it for short stays because of accessibility to the city. Other than that its a good place for long term stays. Language is also a barrier they should get someone conversant with both French and English I liked the cleanliness and the city view, this is an upmarket location

title: Spacious room.
review: Someone was supposed to pick me up at the airport at mid night, they forgot about me or said the driver had an accident but did not inform me. If the owner was quite nice, the receptionist was extremely rude and no one helped me with my luggages to my room when I arrived. It was 1.30am then and people blamed me for arriving so late while I informed them my flight was delayed and they did not pick me up at the airport. Even though they offered me a free shuttle to the bus station the next morning, they made me in a huge situation of distress.  Spacious room. Comfy bed.

title: Good budget option
review: Location shown incorrectly on the website. Breakfast options could be improved Good option if on a tight budget. Flexible with breakfast timings and room was cleaned very well every day.

title: Good value but don't trust the booking.com location...it's really really inaccurate!
review: The hotel was nowhere near its location on the booking.com. map...instead it was about two kilometres away...and that was really really bad since l arrived  late! Good value . Nice staff.

title: Kigali is a must-visit destination. If you're reading this - book here now!
review: The unpaved and rutted streets until you reach the taxi-moto guys are a bit of a pain. But they will always take you right to the door on your way back. Not much to do in the neighborhood itself, but you are only a 500 to 800 RWF ride away from Downtown or Nyamirambo. Eliphase was both knowledgeable and helpful. He made my stay memorable. The house itself is good value - lots of places to sit and relax or work. Very interesting people passing through or staying long term.

title: Nice and quiet.
review: None Good location and nice garden, rooms are clean, quiet and comfortable. The internet is a fiber optic so streaming was a plus. We couldn't find a public transport in the neighborhood but they provided a private car for a city tour at a reasonable price.

title: Good
review: More information of seight seeing in hotel Good services and quite place

title: Not happy
review: food, room ventilation Safety. Common facilities like halls, garden, etc

title: Beautiful
review: None Very nice and cozy place to stay! The staff is very friendly and helps you every time.:)Thanks for the stay

title: Friendly, accommodating, clean, helpful.
review: None Friendly, accommodating, clean, helpful. Highly recommend for the individual traveler.

title: Value for money.
review: Little thing would help make it nicer eg bedside light Value for money. Manager, Jones is excellent and very accommodating

title: The space, the architecture, the design, the cleanliness,...
review:
There was no way to use water after peeing. It would be great to have a tap for after you pee.
There was no portable driver attached to the room, you have to call for one.  The space, the architecture, the design, the cleanliness, the view, the breakfast, the pool and the environment.
It’s very tidy and simply gorgeousssss

title: Its a clean, modern hotel with a pool deck area looking over...
review: Our check in at 11 at night took far too long. Then after I had retired the front desk phoned at half past midnight (!) as they had forgotten to copy my passport. The reception process should really be looked at so as not to drag the rest of this very nice hotel down with a bad first impression. Its a clean, modern hotel with a pool deck area looking over the city. Wifi works well.

title: I like the friendliness of the restaurant staff.
review:
I Just find the staff at the counter was not as friendly as I am used to in north America. I like the friendliness of the restaurant staff.
And fact that the rooms are nice and clean.

title: Hotel staff very good
review:
Services in room were slow.
Water bottles did not serve daily in the room
No room service for food Hotel staff very good 
Rooms were clean
Outside View from the room fantastic 
Restaurant very good 
Price reasonable

title: Fantastic modern hotel - perfect place to stay in Kigali
review: No tea/coffee making facilities in the room. I'm a tea addict :-( Beautifully clean, modern, well laid out room. Fantastic shower. I think I was the first person to stay in the room (1.20) - was spotlessly new. Everything in the room worked well. Comfy bed. Curtains had full block-out fabric so slept really well. The staff were wonderfully attentive. The hotels opening ceremony took place on my second night, which worries me as I had an early flight the next morning. But even though there was a DJ and many guests by the pool/restaurant - I didn't hear a thing in my 1st floor room, because it was so well sound-proofed. My airport shuttle pick-up/drop off was in a nice new Mercedes - and I was the only person being transported both ways. Felt like a private limo and the cost was only just slightly more than a normal taxi ($23 v $20) :-) Journey took about 15mins - with no traffic either way.

title: Perfect hotel for a business trip.  Good value for money.  Don’t expect the thrills of a large hote
review: Service is a bit slow.  Checking in was slow. A new business hotel in a good location.  Modern services.  Rooms are small but perfect for a short business trip.  Service is slow but hotel just open and staff are learning.  Hotel has a great terrace with a great view

title: Slick modern hotel in Kigali.
review: Very bright blue LED on TV at night, rooms are minimalist to the point of being underwhelming - some artwork on the wall by the curtains would lift the room a lot! Friendly staff, clean modern hotel, decking area extending from bar to (small) pool.

title: Be careful while paying
review:
I was cheated by either booking.com or by the hotel. 
When I booked the room alone was 77 usd and room with breakfast was 93 usd.
I paid 93 and had to pay for breakfast again at the hotel.
Had to ask for  change.  The staff took money and didn't return balance .  Clean room
View

title: Awesome!!!!!!!!
review: None Abigail, Allan, Isaac, William and all the rest of the staff were masters of their roles. Ever so friendly. Exec chef was excellent and a super guy. This hotel is amazing and clearly has the best views of the valleys in Kigali. Well done Onomo Kigali. Cheers Butch.

review: Nothing None

title: Fantastic
review: Nothing Everything

title: everything was perfect, just some noise at night
review: some noise at night everything was perfect, just some noise at night

title: Good atmosphere
review: None The neighbourhood is very peaceful, enjoyed walking and exploring around!

title: Impeccable Service, Delicious Food, Wonderful Views and Great Facilities.
review: For a 3/4 star hotel I think the following should be added to the rooms: -Bar fridge -Small mat-Slippers and Robe -A little color in the roomI also think the Airport shuttle is a little overpriced. The food is just great, a lot of variety and impeccable service from ALL staff (Diane at the front desk and Alan at the restaurant were such a delight!). I loved the view of Kigali City both from my room and the restaurant. The rooms are spacious and clean and the place is quite safe! I will defindefinitely be back!!

title: On transit
review:
The front desk officer at the time of check in denied me some of the booking conditions. The booking was for 2 people but he insisted I ve to pay for additional breakfast, which I eventually paid.
I also requested for late checkout but he insisted I have to checkout at 11am.
This was however corrected by another lady officer when I checked out and return few minutes after, as I couldn’t reschedule my flight. 
The lady was polite, apologetic to what happened with the previous booking and she agreed my request for late checkout and promised to table the breakfast issue with her bosses. Neatness and the serenity of the place
Staff were generally polite and attentive to client need.
The advantage to use AMEX made it a favorite hotel for me in Kigali.

title: The hotel rooms are cosy and comfortable.
review: I did not like the fact that I paid for my dinner using USD and I was given back change in Rfw (rwandese francs). The exchange rate they used for this conversion was terrible! I felt cheated. The hotel rooms are cosy and comfortable. The view is equally good and so is the food. The staff are pleasant and helpful.

title: The location was great and you can see the its well...
review:
There is no room service and a limited food menu. During my stay there I didn’t eat much within the hotel itself and the one day I did - I was made to wait for an hour. I would go back and stay there but I’m hoping by then the staff would be better trained and seasoned and perhaps they would have a better menu! 
 The location was great and you can see the its well maintained and new. The staff was pleasant even though they were new and some still being trained. They were helpful with many things such as helping me get a box on the last day cause I over shopped.

title: Staff are very friendly and helpful.
review: None Staff are very friendly and helpful.The location and views of Kigali are amazing. Great service at the restaurant and terrace at any time of day. Highly recommended !

title: The staff is excellent, helpful and smiling.
review:
Rooms should have hotel slippers The staff is excellent, helpful and smiling. The calm of the hotel is much appreciated. Early check inns should be considered for guests arriving with early flights and breakfast should be included in the room price. 
Briefly - Best place to stay in Kigali.

title: Review of Onomo
review: The meals need a bit of work, the breakfast is plant, the croissant were dry, breakfast was not ready at 07:00 and we had to leave for the airport at 07:30.The wifi is weak but I understand its a new hotel so the above can be fixed. The pool area is stunning.The staff is excellent I had a migraine and one of the staff members drove out to buy me headache tablets at midnight, that was heart warming.

title: Hotel with a big plus: the (tiny) swimming pool and a super big NO NO: the unfriendly staff
review: Terrible and unfriendly staff. That ruined totally this trip staying at this hotel, knowing that most staff in Kigali's hotel is super friendly. There won't be a next time! None

title: A little bit away from the down town, but cosy and very new facility with friendly staff.
review: It's a place decorated with a very simple but beautiful  way. This gives the place a very nice ambiance  The restaurant area, it's more than a restaurant. One can enjoy this facility while having delicious food.

title: Great new hotel where the staff go out the way to make you feel welcome.
review: The air conditioning in the room was poor with no power to the fans even when on full, so i had trouble sleeping. Its a shame as this is the only reason i would not stay there again.The menu is very basic for the main dinner meals and it would get boring if you were staying longer than a week. However the food itself is a great standard. The TV has a huge blue light on the bottom. When you want to sleep this lights up the whole room and it annoying. I had to unplug the TV every night. The staff go out of their way to help you and meet all your needs. The hotel is  very new and in a good location overlooking the city. There is a nice chilled pool area where you can eat and its a very open and relaxed area.

title: Good value for money
review: Internet had issues at times. Some of the staff at reception could be more welcoming Location was great. View wad great. The deck is amazing. Some of the staff was extremely helpful

title: Fantastic hotel (for business)
review: We came for holiday, but it has a business atmosphere. Nothing bad, but just our fault for going here when we were looking for a holiday vibe. Great friendly, helpful and professional staffGreat comfort, luxoriousGood food

title: New, clean, good breakfast and very friendly staff.
review: Payment in advance/at check in i requested to talk to manager but he/her never show up, small gym. New, clean, good breakfast and very friendly staff.

title: Good enough
review: Service at the restaurant /bar area was rather slow as there was one or two waiters at any given time and they ended up getting overwhelmed.The breakfast was ------------------------the eggs from the kitchen were ok but the bacon was finished everytime i got downstairs and the other choices were not exciting The staff were very helpful and cheerful . The facilities were good . It looks like a relatively new property so a few areas still need improvement but overall ticked all the boxes.The front office staff were all superb they even taught me some Kinyarwanda...

title: The cleanest place we stayed during our month long trip to...
review: Nothing we didn’t like, but it would be nice to get wash clothes and shampoo/conditioner.  The cleanest place we stayed during our month long trip to Rwanda. The staff were really welcoming and went out of their way to meet our needs.

title: Clean, Good WiFi, Air conditioned
review: WiFi on the first night didn't work .. which was disappointing because I like to tell people at home that I've arrived safely.  BUT .. the next morning they fixed it immediately and it worked for the rest of my 6 night stay. They try really hard to please, staff are very friendly, and I LOVE that the AC controls are in each room.  So I could set it lower .. I get hot easily.

title: A Showcase of Africa's Finest and Excellent Hospitality.
review: The hotel met all my expectations and exceeded them. A showcase of Africa's finest indeed. Located just a stone's throw from the city's main centre (excellent location), the hotel is super clean and provides an exceptional hospitality. The location is quiet and serene. The hotel manager Mr Jeremy Flowerday is very helpful and will guide u throughout your stay. I met him over breakfast inquiring about our stay and how he can further serve us to our satisfaction. Thank you very much for your help and hospitality Mr Flowerday. The staff were very helpful and friendly catering to your every need and to your full satisfaction. The hotel provides u almost every facility with great rooms to the amazing pool with stunning views of the hilly Rwandan capital city, gym and spa.The terrace restaurant of the hotel was wonderful. When I say the food was great (i mean it :)) Try the fish meal (Grilled fillet of Capitaine)....you will thank me later. Overall experience was amazing. I'll most definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, for singles, couples and families be it business or leisure. You won't regret your choice of stay.

title: A delightful hotel with excellent staff and service
review: None With an extremely attentive, friendly but unobtrusive staff, this new, nicely appointed, clean hotel in a central location ticks all boxes.  The outdoor lounge area overlooking the pool and across to the hills of Kigali makes for a delightful sundowner spot!  Onimo serves a good breakfast buffet, has fast, efficient Wifi - all in all, excellent value for money! Highly recommended!

title: There was an advert with promotional code which I presented...
review: None There was an advert with promotional code which I presented and was given more discount

review: The fact that they don’t put tooth paste and brush in the room The washrooms and the pool

title: Great!
review: None Excellent service, great location. Very nice place to stay for a city break.

title: Fantastic breakfast, lovely pool, nice view of the city...
review: None Fantastic breakfast, lovely pool, nice view of the city & great location!

title: The room is very clean.
review: The TV does not have a variety of channels for English speakers so this was upsetting The room is very clean. The restaurant is amazing too

title: Warm and friendly staff and beautiful property made staying there’s pleasure.
review: None The staff was very attentive and friendly.  The property is beautiful and clean. It was an oasis for me.

title: Nice place.
review:
None Nice place. Small hotel, but really nice.
The staff is also very supportive.

title: Friendly, helpful staff.
review: Annoying fan in toilet that couldn’t be switched off.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Great facilities, very modern feel.

title: Lovely fresh design, clean rooms, great shower, comfortable beds anda great location for my needs.
review: The elliptical machine in the fitness centre was broken Breakfast was good, better than most other hotels in Kigali

title: A very clean, well kept hotel.
review: The single beds a too small. There was no electrical kettle in the rooms. A very clean, well kept hotel. Nice swimming pool and good view.

title: Great value for money and lovely staff
review: It would be nice if the hotel could get a licence to provide room service None

title: Kigali is a very clean and green city.
review: Price of meals is a bit higher than expected. Relaxing atmosphere. Clean. Swimming pool. Food is generally good, in particular tilapia.

title: It was an amazing and easy stay
review: None The serenity

title: Improve internet connection
review: Internet connection  Improve internet connection

title: Staff are very friendly.
review:
Toilets in the rooms not much good Staff are very friendly. 
View is amazing.

title: Very nice staff
review: None Very nice staff

title: The staff was very friendly and helpful.
review: None The staff was very friendly and helpful. They were very responsive to some of our questions over email prior to our arrival there. The hotel and the rooms are very clean and comfortable. The rooms are well equipped with basic comforts and we had no complaints at all. The breakfast was decent, and their restaurant is a pleasant space. The location was excellent. Its very quiet and peaceful, with the town and many nice restaurants within walking distance,and most other tourist destinations were a short moto ride away. Its also easy to find and direct the motos to, being so close to the famous Hotel des Mille Collins. The rooms with a balcony dont have an AC and vice versa, so make sure you let them know which one you prefer before you get there. I think they should include this clarification on booking.com page which reflects that all rooms have AC I think. We had the one with a balcony and were happy with it as the weather was quite nice when we visited (April), so didnt really need an AC.

title: Would stay there again any chance I had.
review: One of the few hotels I stayed during the past dozen years which did not provide a hairdryer. All around very friendly and helpful staff, was allowed to check in early. Excellent breakfast and tasty dinners.

title: Value for money
review:
While booking it showed that the room has AC but when reached there realized that they have two types of rooms, rooms with balcony doesn't have AC, they have a table fan kept in the cupboard, had to use that as it is summer now.
Breakfast options are very limited. Staff was good.

title: love the tasteful interior design of the rooms and relaxing atmosphere after a busy day.
review: No complaints! This was my fourth stay in six months and it is definitely my preferred hotel in Kigali. Staff are really friendly, helpful and accommodating. My room was close to the main road but the sound proof door meant the room was quiet. The location both for leisure and work is excellent.

title: 5 Swiss is my 5 star location in Kigali.
review: None 5 Swiss was very amazing place, i am glad i stayed there and i would definitely stay there again. Met the owner and he was kind enough to show me around Kigali. The staff and workers were kind and friendly, so far one of the cleanest and most amazing places i have stayed in a long time.

title: So far our experience has been very special.
review: The bed was a bit hot to start with, because there were not cotton sheets.Also it was a bit dark in the room to start with. Now it is fine. The staff are exceptional. In the cafeteria as well as in the Reception and Cleaning. Also the management is special.We got a move to a garden flat. Which is ideal. The breakfast is superb with its fresh fruits and fresh juice.Ideal place for having interviews.

title: The best hotel to stay in Kigali, very good experience
review: Our trip had an end. :) The location of the hotel is pretty good. You can go to downtown walking and it's safe. The staff is wonderful, very friendly, helpful and always smiling, this is a plus. The wifi connection is pretty good. The room is very good, the bathroom has a good size, some intl tv channels. Breakfast is good, a lot of variety from local to internatinal food. Guys and ladies from the restaurant area are the best. Very friendly. Definitely I would come back there, no doubt about that.

title: Quiet and central location.
review:
None Quiet and central location. Very spacious rooms in combination with fast WiFi, backyard and a very decent restaurant for breakfast and dinner. Above all I need to mention the well organized, warm-hearted and thoughtful staff who assist you with want ever need you. 
Always would like to come back

title: Great room, very quiet even though right off a main road.
review: it was fine for what I needed, but lacks pool, gym, some of the other fancy amenities but if you don't need all that then this place is perfect. Great room, very quiet even though right off a main road.  Location is great, you can walk to all you need on foot.  Very clean and exactly what I needed for my stay.  Breakfast was nice, coffee was outstanding as they had espresso which is a must and not available in many hotels of similar price and range in Kigali.

title: Really fantastic staff, and the food was incredible.
review: Requested a ride from the airport, had it confirmed, no one showed up.   The value doesn’t match what you pay for a room compared to other places in the city.  I just feel you get more for your dollar elsewhere and for less of a price.   Really fantastic staff, and the food was incredible.

title: Peaceful efficient and very friendly. Our favorite hotel in Africa.
review: None We have stayed at 5 Swiss many times. The staff are extremely helpful and welcoming and we always feel at home here. The rooms at the front have beautiful views and some have small balconies which are brilliant. The rooms are immaculate and beautifully but simply designed. Everything runs like clockwork- it’s an amazing balance of total efficiency and a friendly environment. The breakfast and restaurant are great and the area is extremely peaceful. Whatever kind of journey we have had to reach Kigali, we always feel refreshed and restored within a few minutes of arrival at 5 Swiss!

title: Wonderful
review: Breakfast could have had a bit more of spread. But you guys compensate eveything with your warmth & hospitality I have travelled across the Globe. Stayed in properties with high star ratings , big brand names .. But the level of warmth & hospitality felt in 5 Swiss was incomparable.

title: perfect little hotel nearby city center with a very friendly atmosphere
review: Little Problem with the shower: water temperature changed suddenly excellent restaurant, hotel and restaurant modern african style, staff was very gentle !

title: Will definitely refer 5Swiss and/or pay a return visit.
review: The room was over the kitchen and so a little noisy. A permanent shelf or unit to place toiletries in the bathroom. Proper regulation of shower water. Avoid water spillage during a shower. Variety and availability of Fruits could improve. The bed was very comfortable.

title: room was not available anymore when we arrived.
review: room was not available anymore when we arrived. Apparently because the boss checked into the last room with balcony the night before without updating booking.com None

title: Go to small hotel in central Kigali
review: This visit, my room had an unattractive view and was very warm. Building work was a bit intrusive. Quiet, clean, convenient for town. Staff are all friendly, efficient and accommodating. Decor is modern and attractive. Bathrooms are great. Good chef.

title: excellent breakfast;
review: There are two different types of rooms for the same price, one with balcony and view (much better!), one towards the parking area. Unfortunately, I was assigned the latter, while my colleague was more lucky. excellent breakfast; extremely attentive staff

title: The hotel driver , Caesar , by name , was a very good driver...
review: No possibility of breakfast before 7 am ( I had several early starts to make during my 9 days at the hotel ) The hotel driver , Caesar , by name , was a very good driver and exceedingly helpful .

title: Will come back!
review: The only bad thing we found was the mosquitos.. even with the doors and windows closed, moskitos always found a way to get in.. that was annoying (but yes, we had moskito nets so it was ok). Also, there was no AC in the room. The staff was super friendly and helpful. You get a 10 for that! Breakfast is very good as well and complete. Rooms were clean!

title: Classy rooms and safe environment
review: The breakfast was the same everyday, it wasn't delicious and wasn't special and offered no variety. I made my complaints known to the manager and he took it well. I believe its overpriced for what you get, but then again hotel business in Rwanda is just growing. The hotel is in very reserved area which made it very cool. It has the basic facilities, didn't see a pool or Gym so i believe they don't have. The rooms were very clean and tastefully furnished. Bathroom was nice too. The hotel is very safe and its a walking distance to Nakumatt and UTC.

title: Comfortable stay
review: Booking.com indicated air con in room, but no A/C in one of the two rooms we booked. August weather meant we were comfortable without A/C. Firm, comfortable bed; hot shower;  cooked breakfast and excellent coffee in garden setting; friendly staff; central location.

title: Very good other than the lack of air-conditioning.
review: Was promised a hillside room with air-conditioning but this was given to another guest. Air conditioning is important at this time of year. The rooms by the parking area/roadside are air-conditioned but noisy. Basic food & accomodation at a very reasonable price.

title: Pleasant staff
review: I was in a room facing the parking. would have stayed longer if on the other side of the building as it was a bit closed in and no view Very good staff

title: Friendly welcome to Kigali
review: None What a welcome to Rwanda. We arrived early and they did their best to get us into our rooms as soon as possible while offering us something to eat and drink in the restaurant. The staff was incredibly friendly and efficient, giving us good advice on what we should do during the day. The rooms were very clean and comfortable and well appointed. There are two of the best restaurants in Kigali within walking distance. Our only regret is that we didn't stay here on the way back through Kigali too. I would not hesitate to recommend 5 Swiss to anyone.

title: Nice small hotel
review: Furniture in the room is not adequate to the price and the room is rather small. A nice small hotel very well located. Good breakfast, Very kind people. A pick-up service to the airport can be arranged and paid directly with credit card in the hotel.

title: Peaceful paradise in Kigali
review: None Get a room with a view for a stunning sunrise with accompanying birdsong!

title: Value for money
review: More options at breakfast. And please avoid mixing the fruits as some people are allergic to some fruit items. The quiet ambience

title: A comfortable and relaxing place to base ourselves for two days in Kigali
review: no coffee in room (only tea) - slightly noisy outside room super clean and pleasant room- great shower - great breakfast - excellent location
The smell in the room Room was smelling, no AC, too hot;

title: Homely stay with proactive staff

title: Good location and value.
review: Not much of a view. Better suited for budget or business travellers  Good location and value. Rooms were clean and decent breakfast.

title: Awful...do not recommend this
review: We were not given an AC room Reception knew nothing of our reservation in spite of pre check note Finally got room AC unit At 7 am no hot water..had to call service and got it fixed I had paid via booking and they wanted me to pay again No discount either Waste of time talking to them Breakfast

title: Nothing
review: They don’t respect people booking detail (you book a  room type A and you got a type B poorer, once you arrive in the middle of the night they tell you that the price has increased), you will find the rest of the soaps of the previous customer in the room plus insects going around, bathroom is duty, bedsheets are smelling bad, thé TV is half screen and more.  Nothing

title: Rooms are clean
review:
Breakfast needs to be improved 
All Staff within the property must at least have basic English  Rooms are clean 
Location is great 
Staff is friendly but at times had a hard time communicating

title: Disgusting particularly the 1st night as l couldn't sleep most of the night
review: Room108 given to me on 4/9/2018 had stagnant bathroom waste water;there was no AC to cool the room that was hot and stuff; the area outside the window was an eyesore and the dirt out there was smelling. TV was not working. Hence my request for another room.I was given room 213 which was reasonable. None

title: Rooms were nice, service was nice and the view was nice.
review: Hotelrooms on the hill view side of the building were rather loud because of the busy street right next to hotel. Rooms were nice, service was nice and the view was nice.

title: Our two nights stay was lovely
review: I requested for a wedding anniversary cake but the hotel was unable to bake one.A fruit basket in the room would have been a great idea. The restaurant staff are very kind and attentive to details.

I wasn't dropped at the airport  Staff members were helpful and friendly.
Hotel location was excellent 
Food was excellent

review: the rooms, the beds not comfy , the bathrooms got no tubs ..only showerseemed like a 1 star hotel The dinner was good......

title: The Hotel is excellent for the rate.
review: The security is not attentive enough Both are great for the value

title: Excellent!!!
review: I wouldnt change a thing Very beautiful, wonderful neighborhood, great rooms.   A very good breakfast with a view to Kigali.

title: I liked the serenity of the hotel
review: Not applicable because I was satisfied I liked the serenity of the hotel

title: Perfect place for tourist accomodation
review: Too many stairs , would love a lift Awesome staff, clean amenities , very comfortable and secure

title: It was pleasant, save for boring TV stations
review: We were on the side of the road, which is noisy It was clean and spacious rooms.The staff were very hospitable, especially front office.

title: Warm, inviting and welcoming home away from home. Would definitely stay here again.
review: Location is a little tucked away, which in itself was a bonus, but would be good if there were clearer directions/ a street name to give taxi drivers, as they often didn't know where it was. Friendly, amenable staff and welcoming owner who work hard to provide a home away from home. Hotel is slightly tucked away down a street with several taxi drivers not being aware of its whereabouts, so better to get the hotel to organise an airport transfer, if heading to the hotel upon landing. Otherwise be clear about the street address and it's infront of another larger hotel so that's a bit of a landmark to head for. Rooms were spacious and comfortable with plenty of storage, large desk, good WiFi connection and a contemporary decor. Bathroom shower leaked slightly when having a shower, but this wasn't a huge problem. UK power adaptor provided in the room. There's an informal restaurant serving simple but delicious cuisine with a small, but good wine list. Staff were happy to help and accommodated a late check out without any issues. Breakfasts tended to be fresh fruit, cereals, bread and spanish omelette.

title: Enjoyable - good to stay at a hotel that was much more reasonably priced than those nearby.
review: Breakfast could have been better. Located 10 minutes walk from the Kigali Convention Centre (KCC), decent sized bedroom, friendly & helpful staff, not far from the airport (15 minutes at night), restaurants very close by (although I didn't go to any), seemed to be in a safe area.

title: Good accommodation but food is way too expensive to justify staying thee again
review: The rooms are neat and clean The Court Boutique is not value for money. The drinks and wine are way over the top. Average price of a bottle of wine is about USD35 while a class is between USD 10 and  USD15 The rooms have 5 TV channels that work and you have to ask to get a channel you want.  On the second day of my stay, there was no hot water in the showerThe prices for food are equally over priced and so i did not eat lunch or dinner at this place. The African restaurant and Chinese restaurant across  he road are much cheaper and great value for moneyThere was no breakfast on the second day of my stay because the Chef did not turn up for work, and none of the staff thought to even prepare fruits/ tea/ coffee etc

title: Excellent!
review: None This hotel is excellent! I think it needs to be advertised more! I left an hotel to come there and the state is excellent! I will give it 20/10 (200%) all round.

title: Good location for overnight stop near airport.
review: Very little.  Property is down a small access road off 628 St with no obvious sign so we drove past it twice before going in. No kettle in room, or a self help hot drink station.  View from room poor so balcony unused, not a problem for us. Food was tasty, nice fish and pasta dishes which did take 45 minutes so order early. Proximity to airport 15 mins free transfer. Walking distance to RDB.

title: Everything was nice until I realized they stolen 100 USD from my room while I was taking breakfast.
review: I knew stories about stolen cash in Rwandese hotels. That's why I decided to check my wallet before and after going to breakfast. I could not believe my eyes, but 100 USD disappeared from my wallet! I as well noticed another access card in the room (thief from hotel forgot). Nice breakfast, nice food in the restaurant, room is good for the price, airport is not far away, and a nice transfer. Rooms are quite. Staff is friendly and helpful, they returned 100 USD stolen from my room during my breakfast.

title: Everything was nice until I realized they stolen 100 USD from my room while I was taking breakfast.
review: I knew stories about stolen cash in Rwandese hotels. That's why I decided to check my wallet before and after going to breakfast. I could not believe my eyes, but 100 USD disappeared from my wallet! I as well noticed another access card in the room (thief from hotel forgot). Nice breakfast, nice food in the restaurant, room is good for the price, airport is not far away, and a nice transfer. Rooms are quite. Staff is friendly and helpful, they returned 100 USD stolen from my room during my breakfast.

title: Good value for money
review: a little noisy when you are close to external great wall restaurant., breakfast menu was weak no big varieties.no money exchange at reception, however they helped me when i requested by external office. hotel is just new small Motel, all furniture everywhere is new. the location is good and centered 10 mints from Kigali heights.service is  good at hotel, reception as well , especially Daniel was very helpful, thanks to him.pickup from airport to hotel and back to airport was free by prior booking.

title: The hotel met my expectations in terms of accommodation and breakfast
review: I would have liked to have several other guests at the hotel to interact with and enjoy the company of a busy night. The room was great. The bed was comfortable, and the bathroom was cool with nice bathroom robes. I would highly recommend this boutique to hotel to anyone traveling to beautiful Rwanda. Both were breath-taking.

title: Perfect stay in a beautiful hotel
review: None All was very perfect. Very clean everywhere and very nice people. The owner of the hotel is very friendly. I was staying there because of my marriage. 100% I will come back to this hotel.

title: Kind staff, very clean room and comfortabel!
review: Maybe the breakfast could have been better. Maybe a buffet ?This is more a hint. Everything was fine, with a good bed. Staff was very kind and helpful.

title: Fantastic place to stay
review: Nothing of note. Excellent hotel. Staff were very courteous. A meal not on the menu was easily made at my request. I've stayed in four different hotels in Kigali, and this one is my first, second and third choice anytime.

title: Spacious space, the most comfortable bed ever, wide space...
review:
No kettle in default (but we were provided with one when asked) 
Although the staff is very positive, they are not very experienced in service business and it takes 20 mins to get a cup of tea or coffee(when brought, either the spoon or the sugar is missing)
The staff is not very informative in places to go or things to buy Spacious space, the most comfortable bed ever, wide space for your clothes,
Balcony, cleaning of the rooms after every time you leave your room, helpful and very friendly staff

title: Perfect hotel for our short stopover in Kigali.
review: No curtains or blinds in the bathroom. Bathroom window locks did not work and we were on the ground floor. Modern, new hotel. Helpful staff. Good location. Good powerful shower

title: I mistakenly broke a glass in the room and the staff didnt...
review: None I mistakenly broke a glass in the room and the staff didnt required any fund from me. On arrival , I had a free ride from airport to the hotel and from my hotel to the airport. They have a wonderful team

title: I was touched by the warmth of the staff and pride in their work and country.
review: The choice at breakfast was a bit limited but sufficient and tastey. Dinner was excellent. Very friendly and professional staff who were welcoming and willing to do everything to make my stay agreeable.  This included letting me use the driver on a few occasions and doing a late checkout on my final day.I liked the way staff were all happy to chat but never be too intrusive - they got the perfect balance. I will definitely come back to the hotel when I am next in Kigali.

title: FABULOUS Boutique Hotel!!
review: None We love this place! Feels like home. Booked for 5 nights and we keep extending our stay. Great location overlooking the many beautiful hills of Kigali. Rooms are well designed and spotless. ALL the staff is professional, helpful and so friendly. Faustin is exceptional! He is smiling every day and goes above and beyond to make sure everything is perfect. Communication before our arrival was clear and fast. We got a complimentary pick-up from the airport, which is a nice touch. The owners are such nice, welcoming people. We highly recommend this wonderful Boutique Hotel and will be sad to leave.

title: Amazing people, excellent facilities
review: None The hotel sent a very nice car to meet me at the airport, extremely friendly and helpful staff who went out of their way to make sure I was comfortable. I would unreservedly recommend this hotel to anybody visiting Kigali - it is proximal to all the places you would want to go.

title: We had a wonderful stay! We were so glad to have given this new hotel a try.
review: None Everything! The rooms are new, decorated wonderfully and VERY clean! The bed's comfort was dreamy!The hotel is near everything you will need in Kigali whether for leisure or business with ample parking space. The staff was amazing!

title: Just the BEST place for a business trip. Will def stay there next time!
review: Its a new place, so it might have some small areas of improvements, thats normal. it does not have Mosquito nets over the bed, which I think is fine, they said they will try to put up some but it takes a while. They put in these repellants in outlets, and I did not see any mosquitos,  but its worth knowing. For some people this is super important. And in general I think there should be nets. This is the only thing I can think of as improvement but with the amazing staff I am sure that this will be done! The staff was AMAZINGLY kind, I felt so well taken care of. Anything I needed they attended to, and everyone was just genuinely kind and helpful. I had a huge delay so I missed first night, without even asking they deducted the night from my bill. And they were so flexible with pickup. I mean, I just don't have words enough to say how grateful I was to stay there! The owner and the staff is very concerned with the guests well being! When travelling for work its so nice when things just work out and the place you stay at is so welcoming. The food at the restaurant was also really good. And there are other restos around walking distance. Re the room  - it was nice and clean and comfy, great terrace, it was quiet and relaxing... But I valued the staff the most I must say! One of the best places I stayed at for a business trip!

title: The staff were extremely friendly and helpful.
review: None The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. The shuttle that was sent to fetch us at the airport waited for 2 hours until we finally got through passport control and collected our luggage. They went out of their way to help me retrieve my lost luggage by making numerous phone calls to the airport. The hotel is small and well situated - I attended a congress at the Kigali Covention Centre and I could walk from the hotel. I would definitely consider the hotel if I travel to Kigali in future.

title: A beautiful hotel in Kigali
review: It was really late when we checked-in, so we ordered dinner from the hotel, which wasn't so bad, but expensive compared to other places in Kigali. The breakfast here was also poor. We were the only guests there our last night, so they didn't even set-up a breakfast buffet and we had to wait 30 minutes to get a tiny breakfast. This is the only downside of staying here. This is a beautiful boutique hotel in a great location in Kigali, close to many good restaurants and a 15 minutes drive to the city center . They offered an airport shuttle from and to the airport for free and it was right on time, and very comfortable. The room was clean, tidy, and beautifully designed. The staff were friendly and helpful most of the time. Would definitely recommend this place!

title: Very good hotel
review: the bathrooms were smelly in both the rooms we had. very friendly and helpful staff, free airport transfer. good location, appr. 5 - 10min to the city centre by taxi. many restaurants are nearby.

title: Nice hotel in good part of Kigali
review: Bathroom had sewer-type stench that the staff were unable to fix. My room was above the kitchen, with noise (dishwashing, talking) coming from downstairs, even late at night. New hotel, almost everything in good shape. Good location and very well priced compared to other hotels in the neighbourhood. Staff very friendly ("this is now your second home"). Bed very comfortable. Breakfast is made to order, but best to indicate your preferred time the night before to reduce waiting time.

title: I highly recommend this hotel
review: None Every aspect of our stay at the Court Boutique was excellent. The staff were extremely flexible and accommodating in allowing us to check in early and they picked us up from the airport at no charge. Our room was tastefully decorated, comfortable, and immaculate. The breakfast was delicious: Spanish omelette, coffee and juice, sausage, bread, fruit. The hotel is well located and walkable to many parts of the city.

title: This is a hidden gem.
review: None This is a hidden gem. I think there are not that many review because it is new, but it is great! Exceptional value for the price, incredible staff. They did all they could to make me comfortable. Travel a great deal for work, will be staying here every time I am in Kigali.

title: Good location, clean rooms, kind staff and perfect breakfast
review: None Good location, clean rooms, kind staff and perfect breakfast

review: N/A The omlette was great!

review: None The staff are extra helpful and go the extra mile

title: A swimming pool would have been nice.
review: A swimming pool would have been nice.Room was a dark hole without a view. A swimming pool would have been nice. None

title: comfy, clean, friendly staff
review: location not known to many taxi drivers comfy, clean, friendly staff

title: Staff was great, we had an upgrade to an amazing room with a...
review: It was all good  Staff was great, we had an upgrade to an amazing room with a balcony which we could watch the sunrise and set. Lovely hotel!

title: The rooms are SUPER BIG.
review: None The rooms are SUPER BIG. Exceeded my expectations. Very clean, spacious , SERENE and comfortable. I’m definitely coming back.

title: Comfortable stay
review: The restaurant had nothing on the menu I wanted and I found a coackroach in the bathroom, the cleaning was not the best . The Christmas setting.

title: Hospitality of staff
review: None Hospitality of staff

title: Excellent!
review: Breakfast and especially range of bread / options could have been better. Friendliness of staff, cleanliness, location to KCC

title: Astonishing
review: None The bed was comfortable

title: Quaint hotel with charming staff and great food. Classy and much preferred to big sprawling hotels.
review: None Excellent location and wonderful staff that go out of their way for their guests.

title: Absolute gem of a hotel in Kigali!
review: Nothing. Everything. Quiet rooms, absolutely fantastic staff, quiet yet very central location, amazing bed, very clean....

review: Difficult to find.  Cosy private

title: Will never book there again or send frends there

title: The staff is very attentive, good location
review: Poor breakfast, toiletries, window in the bathroom facing to another buildings with see through curtains,  The staff is very attentive, good location

title: Beautiful, quiet, out of the way, yet close enough to Kigali Convention Centre. Lovely service!
review: Wifi was available but weak signal in my room None

title: Modern and clean, but wi-fi could be better
review: Wi-fi in my room was a bit spotty Room is modern and very clean. Comfortable bed. Balcony on the room was a plus.

title: A sign outside the entrance drive will make it easier to...
review: A sign outside the entrance drive will make it easier to find initially. None

title: A warm welcome to Rwanda
review: Nothing to complain about! Complimentary shuttle from the airport

title: A brilliant stay and lovely hideaway.
review: None Very attentive and helpful staff

title: Highly recommended.
review: None Highly recommended. Very friendly and attentive staff.

title: Excellent
review: I like all services including hotel's interior, peaceful location, service, security, cleanness etc. Everything is good. Excellent service !

title: Absolutely fantastic and anyone can stay in the hotel comfortably.
review: The front view of the hotel doesn't seem attractive and very limited space for garden and parking. Though I informed the reception in advance for shuttle service  for airport drop, the car has not been provided in time and delayed me from airport  check in. The bed room senses comfortable and luxuries. The back seat with pool view is amazing. Bath room facility is absolutely complete. Staffs are very welcoming. we tested a very nice pizza though it took  extended time to serve.

title: Cozy family like place :)
review: Swimming pool is cold. Finding restaurant is like labyrinth at first. Very Homy, feel nice cozy rooms. I like the 'family owned' feel to it. Also liked the outdoor therase for breakfast.

title: Good stay in a modern very clean hotel with excellent staff
review: Nothing specific to Scheba! My only gripe Was with the Internet..... connectivity was slow and had frequents outages! This of course maybe a wider problem and not just specific to Scheba Service is excellent - the staff are extremely polite and attentive and respond to requests promptly and always with a smile!

title: Very nice!!
review: Dinning area Size of the room, and cleanliness

title: Excellent experience and a nice property to stay. its just like home.
review: I cant remember I enjoyed it. The staff are good easy going and helpul

title: This hotel could be good but so many things need fixing.
review: Very poor management, no water.  Terrible breakfast, No staff training. None

title: Nice hotel for a good stay in Kigali.
review: The fitness room and machines should be maintained better. Nice hotel with a nice pool area. Friendly staff.

title: Excellent for business trips.
review: None Quick and easy upgrade. Friendly staff.

title: Location.
review: None Location. Cleanliness. It should be a FIVE STAR!!!

title: Poor variety and delays in breakfast.
review: Poor variety and delays in breakfast. Lack of preparedness in receiving guests who had pre-booked online. Staff needed to be prompted a lot. None

title: Good location Close to city center.
review: Pool cleansing didn't work. Good location Close to city center. Excellent staff, thanks to Charles and Diane.

title: Kigali Experience
review: There is no DSTV  hence could not watch TV programs in English  The neat room and responsive staffs

title: It was great!
review: The restaurant has limited food choices The rooms, wifi and people are exellent
